GE07mbh_15_u:000.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_15_u:000.000-0003_02: astu bhūr dadhidugdhābhyām astu muktyaiva muktaye
GE07mbh_15_u:001.001a: prāpya rājyaṃ mahābhāgāḥ pāṇḍavā me pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.002a: sa hi rājā hatāmātyo hataputro nirāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.002c: katham āsīd dhataiśvaryo gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:001.003a: kiyantaṃ caiva kālaṃ te pitaro mama pūrvakāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.003c: sthitā rājye mahātmānas tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:001.005c: yuyutsuś cāpi medhāvī vaiśyāputraḥ sa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.006a: pāṇḍavāḥ sarvakāryāṇi saṃpṛcchanti sma taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:001.006c: cakrus tenābhyanujñātā varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_15_u:001.007a: sadā hi gatvā te vīrāḥ paryupāsanta taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:001.007f-0004_01: rājann etāni sarvāṇi sa ca tān anvavartata
GE07mbh_15_u:001.008c: draupadī ca subhadrā ca yāś cānyāḥ pāṇḍavastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.008e: samāṃ vṛttim avartanta tayoḥ śvaśrvor yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_15_u:001.010c: viduraḥ saṃjayaś caiva yuyutsuś caiva kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.010e: upāsate sma taṃ vṛddhaṃ hataputraṃ janādhipam
GE07mbh_15_u:001.011a: syālo droṇasya yaś caiko dayito brāhmaṇo mahān
GE07mbh_15_u:001.011c: sa ca tasmin maheṣvāsaḥ kṛpaḥ samabhavat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.012a: vyāsaś ca bhagavān nityaṃ vāsaṃ cakre nṛpeṇa ha
GE07mbh_15_u:001.014a: sāmantebhyaḥ priyāṇy asya kāryāṇi sugurūṇy api
GE07mbh_15_u:001.015a: akarod bandhamokṣāṃś ca vadhyānāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.015c: na ca dharmātmajo rājā kadā cit kiṃ cid abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:001.018a: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_15_u:001.019a: maireyaṃ madhu māṃsāni pānakāni laghūni ca
GE07mbh_15_u:001.019c: citrān bhakṣyavikārāṃś ca cakrur asya yathā purā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.020c: upātiṣṭhanta te sarve kauravendraṃ yathā purā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.021a: kuntī ca draupadī caiva sātvatī caiva bhāminī
GE07mbh_15_u:001.021c: ulūpī nāgakanyā ca devī citrāṅgadā tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.022b-0006_01: etāś cānyāś ca bahvyo vai yoṣito bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:001.023a: yathā putraviyukto 'yaṃ na kiṃ cid duḥkham āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_15_u:001.023c: iti rājānvaśād bhrātṝn nityam eva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:001.024a: evaṃ te dharmarājasya śrutvā vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_15_u:001.024c: saviśeṣam avartanta bhīmam ekaṃ vinā tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:001.025a: na hi tat tasya vīrasya hṛdayād apasarpati
GE07mbh_15_u:002.002c: tac ca kuntīsuto rājā sarvam evānvamodata
GE07mbh_15_u:002.003c: uvāca sa tadā bhrātṝn amātyāṃś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.004a: mayā caiva bhavadbhiś ca mānya eṣa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.004c: nideśe dhṛtarāṣṭrasya yaḥ sthāsyati sa me suhṛt
GE07mbh_15_u:002.004e: viparītaś ca me śatrur nirasyaś ca bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.005c: dadātu rājā sarveṣāṃ yāvad asya cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:002.006a: tataḥ sa rājā kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.007a: dharmarājaś ca bhīmaś ca savyasācī yamāv api
GE07mbh_15_u:002.008a: kathaṃ nu rājā vṛddhaḥ san putraśokasamāhataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.008c: śokam asmatkṛtaṃ prāpya na mriyeteti cintyate
GE07mbh_15_u:002.009a: yāvad dhi kurumukhyasya jīvatputrasya vai sukham
GE07mbh_15_u:002.009c: babhūva tad avāpnotu bhogāṃś ceti vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.010a: tatas te sahitāḥ sarve bhrātaraḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:002.011a: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca tān vīrān vinītān vinaye sthitān
GE07mbh_15_u:002.012c: ānṛṇyam agamat kāmān viprebhyaḥ pratipādya vai
GE07mbh_15_u:002.013c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito dhīmān pūjayām āsa taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:003.001c: nāpaśyata tadā kiṃ cid apriyaṃ pāṇḍunandane
GE07mbh_15_u:003.003a: saubaleyī ca gāndhārī putraśokam apāsya tam
GE07mbh_15_u:003.003c: sadaiva prītimaty āsīt tanayeṣu nijeṣv iva
GE07mbh_15_u:003.004a: priyāṇy eva tu kauravyo nāpriyāṇi kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_15_u:003.005a: yad yad brūte ca kiṃ cit sa dhṛtarāṣṭro narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.005c: guru vā laghu vā kāryaṃ gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:003.006a: tat sa rājā mahārāja pāṇḍavānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.006c: pūjayitvā vacas tat tad akārṣīt paravīrahā
GE07mbh_15_u:003.007a: tena tasyābhavat prīto vṛttena sa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.007c: anvatapyac ca saṃsmṛtya putraṃ mandam acetasam
GE07mbh_15_u:003.008a: sadā ca prātar utthāya kṛtajapyaḥ śucir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.009a: brāhmaṇān vācayitvā ca hutvā caiva hutāśanam
GE07mbh_15_u:003.010a: na tāṃ prītiṃ parām āpa putrebhyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.010c: yāṃ prītiṃ pāṇḍuputrebhyaḥ samavāpa tadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.011a: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛddhānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:003.012a: yac ca kiṃ cit purā pāpaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasutaiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:003.012c: akṛtvā hṛdi tad rājā taṃ nṛpaṃ so 'nvavartata
GE07mbh_15_u:003.013a: yaś ca kaś cin naraḥ kiṃ cid apriyaṃ cāmbikāsute
GE07mbh_15_u:003.013c: kurute dveṣyatām eti sa kaunteyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.014a: na rājño dhṛtarāṣṭrasya na ca duryodhanasya vai
GE07mbh_15_u:003.014c: uvāca duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cid yudhiṣṭhirabhayān naraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:003.015a: dhṛtyā tuṣṭo narendrasya gāndhārī viduras tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:003.015c: śaucena cājātaśatror na tu bhīmasya śatruhan
GE07mbh_15_u:003.016c: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca saṃprekṣya sadā bhavati durmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.001c: nāntaraṃ dadṛśū rājan puruṣāḥ praṇayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:004.002a: yadā tu kauravo rājā putraṃ sasmāra bāliśam
GE07mbh_15_u:004.002c: tadā bhīmaṃ hṛdā rājann apadhyāti sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.003d-0007_01: kauravaś caiva bhīmaś ca hṛdānyonyam amṛṣyatām
GE07mbh_15_u:004.004c: ājñāṃ pratyaharac cāpi kṛtakaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:004.004d-0008_01: saṃvatsarāṇy athaivaṃ te vṛttavantaś ca kāni cit
GE07mbh_15_u:004.004d-0009_01: smaran durmantritaṃ tasya vṛttāny apy asya kāni cit
GE07mbh_15_u:004.004d-0010_01: asakṛc cāpy uvācedaṃ hatās te mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.006c: provācātha susaṃrabdho bhīmaḥ sa paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.007d-0011_01: asakṛc cāpy uvācedaṃ hatās te mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.008a: imau tau parighaprakhyau bhujau mama durāsadau
GE07mbh_15_u:004.008c: yayor antaram āsādya dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kṣayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.008d-0012_02: yāv āsādya raṇe mūḍhā dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kṣayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.009a: tāv imau candanenāktau vandanīyau ca me bhujau
GE07mbh_15_u:004.010a: etāś cānyāś ca vividhāḥ śalyabhūtā janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.010c: vṛkodarasya tā vācaḥ śrutvā nirvedam āgamat
GE07mbh_15_u:004.011d-0014_01: kuntyāḥ saparyāṃ saṃvīkṣya śāpe nāsyākaron matim
GE07mbh_15_u:004.012d-0015_02: tapoyogāt tapas taptuṃ manaś cakre mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:004.013c: śvetāśvo vātha kuntī vā draupadī vā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:004.014c: rājñas tu cittaṃ rakṣantau nocatuḥ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE07mbh_15_u:004.015c: bāṣpasaṃdigdham atyartham idam āha vaco bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:004.015d-0016_04: vanaṃ yiyāsur vacanaṃ babhāṣe dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_15_u:005.001a: viditaṃ bhavatām etad yathā vṛttaḥ kurukṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.001c: mamāparādhāt tat sarvam iti jñeyaṃ tu kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.003a: yac cāhaṃ vāsudevasya vākyaṃ nāśrauṣam arthavat
GE07mbh_15_u:005.003c: vadhyatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ pāpaḥ sāmātya iti durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.004c: vidureṇātha bhīṣmeṇa droṇena ca kṛpeṇa ca
GE07mbh_15_u:005.005a: pade pade bhagavatā vyāsena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_15_u:005.005c: saṃjayenātha gāndhāryā tad idaṃ tapyate 'dya mām
GE07mbh_15_u:005.006c: na dattavāñ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ pitṛpaitāmahīm imām
GE07mbh_15_u:005.007c: etac chreyaḥ sa paramam amanyata janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.007d-0018_02: akṛtvā vacanaṃ paścāt tapsyāmy adya sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.008a: so 'ham etāny alīkāni nivṛttāny ātmanaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:005.009a: viśeṣatas tu dahyāmi varṣaṃ pañcadaśaṃ hi vai
GE07mbh_15_u:005.010a: caturthe niyate kāle kadā cid api cāṣṭame
GE07mbh_15_u:005.010c: tṛṣṇāvinayanaṃ bhuñje gāndhārī veda tan mama
GE07mbh_15_u:005.011a: karoty āhāram iti māṃ sarvaḥ parijanaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:005.013b-0019_01: hataṃ śataṃ tu putrāṇāṃ yayor yuddhe 'palāyinām
GE07mbh_15_u:005.013c: nānutapyāmi tac cāhaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ hi taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.014a: bhadraṃ te yādavīmātar vākyaṃ cedaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_15_u:005.014c: sukham asmy uṣitaḥ putra tvayā suparipālitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.015a: mahādānāni dattāni śrāddhāni ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.015c: prakṛṣṭaṃ me vayaḥ putra puṇyaṃ cīrṇaṃ yathābalam
GE07mbh_15_u:005.016c: samatītā nṛśaṃsās te dharmeṇa nihatā yudhi
GE07mbh_15_u:005.017c: sarve śastrajitāṃl lokān gatās te 'bhimukhaṃ hatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.018a: ātmanas tu hitaṃ mukhyaṃ pratikartavyam adya me
GE07mbh_15_u:005.018c: gāndhāryāś caiva rājendra tad anujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:005.019a: tvaṃ hi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ satataṃ dharmavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:005.019c: rājā guruḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ tasmād etad bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_15_u:005.020a: anujñātas tvayā vīra saṃśrayeyaṃ vanāny aham
GE07mbh_15_u:005.021a: ucitaṃ naḥ kule tāta sarveṣāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:005.021c: putreṣv aiśvaryam ādhāya vayaso 'nte vanaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:005.022a: tatrāhaṃ vāyubhakṣo vā nirāhāro 'pi vā vasan
GE07mbh_15_u:005.022c: patnyā sahānayā vīra cariṣyāmi tapaḥ param
GE07mbh_15_u:005.023a: tvaṃ cāpi phalabhāk tāta tapasaḥ pārthivo hy asi
GE07mbh_15_u:005.023c: phalabhājo hi rājānaḥ kalyāṇasyetarasya vā vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.000-0021_01: tarasā manasā dhyātvā gamanaṃ sa vanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:006.000-0021_02: tasya rājñas tadā rājā provācedaṃ vacaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_15_u:006.001a: na māṃ prīṇayate rājyaṃ tvayy evaṃ duḥkhite nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:006.001c: dhiṅ mām astu sudurbuddhiṃ rājyasaktaṃ pramādinam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.003c: viśvāsayitvā pūrvaṃ māṃ yad idaṃ duḥkham aśnuthāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.004a: kiṃ me rājyena bhogair vā kiṃ yajñaiḥ kiṃ sukhena vā
GE07mbh_15_u:006.004c: yasya me tvaṃ mahīpāla duḥkhāny etāny avāptavān
GE07mbh_15_u:006.005a: pīḍitaṃ cāpi jānāmi rājyam ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:006.006a: bhavān pitā bhavān mātā bhavān naḥ paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.006c: bhavatā viprahīṇā hi kva nu tiṣṭhāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.007c: astu rājā mahārāja yaṃ cānyaṃ manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_15_u:006.008a: ahaṃ vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi bhavān rājyaṃ praśāstv idam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.008c: na mām ayaśasā dagdhaṃ bhūyas tvaṃ dagdhum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:006.009a: nāhaṃ rājā bhavān rājā bhavatā paravān aham
GE07mbh_15_u:006.009c: kathaṃ guruṃ tvāṃ dharmajñam anujñātum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_15_u:006.010a: na manyur hṛdi naḥ kaś cid duryodhanakṛte 'nagha
GE07mbh_15_u:006.010c: bhavitavyaṃ tathā tad dhi vayaṃ te caiva mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.011a: vayaṃ hi putrā bhavato yathā duryodhanādayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.011c: gāndhārī caiva kuntī ca nirviśeṣe mate mama
GE07mbh_15_u:006.012a: sa māṃ tvaṃ yadi rājendra parityajya gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:006.013c: bhavatā viprahīṇasya na me prītikarī bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:006.014a: bhavadīyam idaṃ sarvaṃ śirasā tvāṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_15_u:006.014c: tvadadhīnāḥ sma rājendra vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.015a: bhavitavyam anuprāptaṃ manye tvāṃ taj janādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:006.015c: diṣṭyā śuśrūṣamāṇas tvāṃ mokṣyāmi manaso jvaram
GE07mbh_15_u:006.016a: tāpasye me manas tāta vartate kurunandana
GE07mbh_15_u:006.017a: ciram asmy uṣitaḥ putra ciraṃ śuśrūṣitas tvayā
GE07mbh_15_u:006.017c: vṛddhaṃ mām abhyanujñātuṃ tvam arhasi janādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:006.019a: saṃjayaṃ ca mahāmātraṃ kṛpaṃ cāpi mahāratham
GE07mbh_15_u:006.020a: glāyate me mano hīdaṃ mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati
GE07mbh_15_u:006.020c: vayasā ca prakṛṣṭena vāgvyāyāmena caiva hi
GE07mbh_15_u:006.021a: ity uktvā sa tu dharmātmā vṛddho rājā kurūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:006.022a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathāsīnaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ kurupārthivam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.022c: ārtiṃ rājā yayau tūrṇaṃ kaunteyaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_15_u:006.023c: so 'yaṃ nārīm upāśritya śete rājā gatāsuvat
GE07mbh_15_u:006.024a: āyasī pratimā yena bhīmasenasya vai purā
GE07mbh_15_u:006.024c: cūrṇīkṛtā balavatā sa balārthī śritaḥ striyam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.025a: dhig astu mām adharmajñaṃ dhig buddhiṃ dhik ca me śrutam
GE07mbh_15_u:006.026a: aham apy upavatsyāmi yathaivāyaṃ gurur mama
GE07mbh_15_u:006.026c: yadi rājā na bhuṅkte 'yaṃ gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:006.027c: uro mukhaṃ ca śanakaiḥ paryamārjata dharmavit
GE07mbh_15_u:006.028c: pāṇisparśena rājñas tu rājā saṃjñām avāpa ha
GE07mbh_15_u:007.001a: spṛśa māṃ pāṇinā bhūyaḥ pariṣvaja ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_15_u:007.002c: pāṇibhyāṃ ca parispraṣṭuṃ prāṇā hi na jahur mama
GE07mbh_15_u:007.003a: aṣṭamo hy adya kālo 'yam āhārasya kṛtasya me
GE07mbh_15_u:007.004a: vyāyāmaś cāyam atyarthaṃ kṛtas tvām abhiyācatā
GE07mbh_15_u:007.006a: evam uktas tu kaunteyaḥ pitrā jyeṣṭhena bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:007.006c: pasparśa sarvagātreṣu sauhārdāt taṃ śanais tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:007.008a: vidurādayaś ca te sarve rurudur duḥkhitā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:007.008c: atiduḥkhāc ca rājānaṃ nocuḥ kiṃ cana pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:007.009a: gāndhārī tv eva dharmajñā manasodvahatī bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:007.009c: duḥkhāny avārayad rājan maivam ity eva cābravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:007.010a: itarās tu striyaḥ sarvāḥ kuntyā saha suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:007.012a: glāyate me manas tāta bhūyo bhūyaḥ prajalpataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:007.012c: na mām ataḥ paraṃ putra parikleṣṭum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:007.013a: tasmiṃs tu kauravendre taṃ tathā bruvati pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_15_u:007.014a: dṛṣṭvā kṛśaṃ vivarṇaṃ ca rājānam atathocitam
GE07mbh_15_u:007.015c: śokajaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjya punar vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:007.016a: na kāmaye naraśreṣṭha jīvitaṃ pṛthivīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:007.016c: yathā tava priyaṃ rājaṃś cikīrṣāmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_15_u:007.017a: yadi tv aham anugrāhyo bhavato dayito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_15_u:007.017c: kriyatāṃ tāvad āhāras tato vetsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:007.018c: anujñātas tvayā putra bhuñjīyām iti kāmaye
GE07mbh_15_u:008.002a: ayaṃ hi vṛddho nṛpatir hataputro viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.002c: nedaṃ kṛcchraṃ cirataraṃ sahed iti matir mama
GE07mbh_15_u:008.004a: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ bravīmi kuru me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.004c: anujñāṃ labhatāṃ rājā mā vṛtheha mariṣyati
GE07mbh_15_u:008.004d-0023_01: svastho bhavatv ayaṃ dhīmān vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE07mbh_15_u:008.005c: rājarṣīṇāṃ hi sarveṣām ante vanam upāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.006a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājā vyāsenādbhutakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_15_u:008.007a: bhagavān eva no mānyo bhagavān eva no guruḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.007c: bhagavān asya rājyasya kulasya ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:008.008a: ahaṃ tu putro bhagavān pitā rājā guruś ca me
GE07mbh_15_u:008.008c: nideśavartī ca pituḥ putro bhavati dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.009a: ity uktaḥ sa tu taṃ prāha vyāso dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.009c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mahātejāḥ punar eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_15_u:008.010a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:008.010c: rājāyaṃ vṛddhatāṃ prāptaḥ pramāṇe parame sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.011c: karotu svam abhiprāyaṃ māsya vighnakaro bhava
GE07mbh_15_u:008.012a: eṣa eva paro dharmo rājarṣīṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:008.012c: samare vā bhaven mṛtyur vane vā vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_15_u:008.013a: pitrā tu tava rājendra pāṇḍunā pṛthivīkṣitā
GE07mbh_15_u:008.014c: mahadbhir iṣṭaṃ bhogāś ca bhuktāḥ putrāś ca pālitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.015a: putrasaṃsthaṃ ca vipulaṃ rājyaṃ viproṣite tvayi
GE07mbh_15_u:008.015c: trayodaśasamā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ ca vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_15_u:008.017c: na manyur vidyate cāsya susūkṣmo 'pi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:008.018a: etāvad uktvā vacanam anujñāpya ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_15_u:008.018c: tathāstv iti ca tenoktaḥ kaunteyena yayau vanam
GE07mbh_15_u:008.019a: gate bhagavati vyāse rājā pāṇḍusutas tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.019c: provāca pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ mandaṃ mandam ivānataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.020a: yad āha bhagavān vyāso yac cāpi bhavato matam
GE07mbh_15_u:008.020c: yad āha ca maheṣvāsaḥ kṛpo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:008.021a: yuyutsuḥ saṃjayaś caiva tat kartāsmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_15_u:008.021c: sarve hy ete 'numānyā me kulasyāsya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.022a: idaṃ tu yāce nṛpate tvām ahaṃ śirasā nataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:008.022c: kriyatāṃ tāvad āhāras tato gacchāśramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:009.002c: padātiḥ sa mahīpālo jīrṇo gajapatir yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:009.003a: tam anvagacchad viduro vidvān sūtaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:009.003c: sa cāpi parameṣvāsaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:009.005a: gāndhārī caiva dharmajñā kuntyā saha manasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:009.006c: pāṇḍavāś ca kuruśreṣṭham upātiṣṭhanta taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:009.009a: tat tu śakyaṃ yathā tāta rakṣituṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_15_u:009.009c: rājyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kaunteya vidvān asi nibodha tat
GE07mbh_15_u:009.010c: śṛṇuyās te ca yad brūyuḥ kuryāś caivāvicārayan
GE07mbh_15_u:009.011a: prātar utthāya tān rājan pūjayitvā yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_15_u:009.012a: te tu saṃmānitā rājaṃs tvayā rājyahitārthinā
GE07mbh_15_u:009.013c: hitāya vai bhaviṣyanti rakṣitaṃ draviṇaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:009.014c: dāntān karmasu sarveṣu mukhyān mukhyeṣu yojayeḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:009.015a: cārayethāś ca satataṃ cārair aviditaiḥ parān
GE07mbh_15_u:009.016a: puraṃ ca te suguptaṃ syād dṛḍhaprākāratoraṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:009.017a: tasya dvārāṇi kāryāṇi paryāptāni bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_15_u:009.018c: ātmā ca rakṣyaḥ satataṃ bhojanādiṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:009.019c: striyaś ca te suguptāḥ syur vṛddhair āptair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:009.019e: śīlavadbhiḥ kulīnaiś ca vidvadbhiś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:009.020c: vinītāṃś ca kulīnāṃś ca dharmārthakuśalān ṛjūn
GE07mbh_15_u:009.021a: taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayethās tvaṃ nātyarthaṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_15_u:009.021c: samastair api ca vyastair vyapadeśena kena cit
GE07mbh_15_u:009.022c: araṇye niḥśalāke vā na ca rātrau kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_15_u:009.023c: sarve mantragṛhe varjyā ye cāpi jaḍapaṅgukāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:009.024a: mantrabhede hi ye doṣā bhavanti pṛthivīkṣitām
GE07mbh_15_u:009.024c: na te śakyāḥ samādhātuṃ kathaṃ cid iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:009.025a: doṣāṃś ca mantrabhedeṣu brūyās tvaṃ mantrimaṇḍale
GE07mbh_15_u:009.025c: abhede ca guṇān rājan punaḥ punar ariṃdama
GE07mbh_15_u:009.026c: yathā syād viditaṃ rājaṃs tathā kāryam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_15_u:010.001a: vyavahārāś ca te tāta nityam āptair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.001c: yojyās tuṣṭair hitai rājan nityaṃ cārair anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.001d-0024_01: alubdhaiś cāsya vyasanibhiḥ snigdhair ātmasamaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:010.002a: parimāṇaṃ viditvā ca daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:010.004a: ākroṣṭāraś ca lubdhāś ca hantāraḥ sāhasapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.004f-0025_01: avarodhabhūmau bhṛtyais tu saha pānaṃ vivarjayet
GE07mbh_15_u:010.004f-0025_02: ākrośanty anumattās te kalatraṃ cāpi gṛhṇate
GE07mbh_15_u:010.004f-0025_03: jighāṃsanty api śastreṇa naṣṭāḥ krīḍanti cotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.004f-0025_07: buddhvemān pānadoṣāṃs tu pibed ekaḥ svajāyayā
GE07mbh_15_u:010.005a: prātar eva hi paśyethā ye kuryur vyayakarma te
GE07mbh_15_u:010.005c: alaṃkāram atho bhojyam ata ūrdhvaṃ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.006a: paśyethāś ca tato yodhān sadā tvaṃ pariharṣayan
GE07mbh_15_u:010.006c: dūtānāṃ ca carāṇāṃ ca pradoṣas te sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:010.007c: madhyarātre vihāras te madhyāhne ca sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:010.008a: sarve tv ātyayikāḥ kālāḥ kāryāṇāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:010.008e: cakravat karmaṇāṃ tāta paryāyo hy eṣa nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.009a: kośasya saṃcaye yatnaṃ kurvīthā nyāyataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:010.010a: cārair viditvā śatrūṃś ca ye te rājyāntarāyiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.010c: tān āptaiḥ puruṣair dūrād ghātayethāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_15_u:010.012a: senāpraṇetā ca bhavet tava tāta dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.012c: śūraḥ kleśasahaś caiva priyaś ca tava mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.013a: sarve jānapadāś caiva tava karmāṇi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_15_u:010.013c: paurogavāś ca sabhyāś ca kuryur ye vyavahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:010.014a: svarandhraṃ pararandhraṃ ca sveṣu caiva pareṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:010.016a: guṇārthināṃ guṇaḥ kāryo viduṣāṃ te janādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:010.016c: avicālyāś ca te te syur yathā merur mahāgiriḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.001a: maṇḍalāni ca budhyethāḥ pareṣām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:011.003c: balāni ca kuruśreṣṭha bhavanty eṣāṃ yathecchakam
GE07mbh_15_u:011.004a: te ca dvādaśa kaunteya rājñāṃ vai vividhātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.004c: mantripradhānāś ca guṇāḥ ṣaṣṭir dvādaśa ca prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:011.005a: etan maṇḍalam ity āhur ācāryā nītikovidāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.005c: atra ṣāḍguṇyam āyattaṃ yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tat
GE07mbh_15_u:011.006a: vṛddhikṣayau ca vijñeyau sthānaṃ ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_15_u:011.007c: vigṛhya śatrūn kaunteya yāyāt kṣitipatis tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:011.008a: dravyāṇāṃ saṃcayaś caiva kartavyaḥ syān mahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:011.009a: tadā sarvaṃ vidheyaṃ syāt sthānaṃ ca na vibhājayet
GE07mbh_15_u:011.011c: viparītas tu te 'deyaḥ putra kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_15_u:011.011e: tasya pramokṣe yatnaṃ ca kuryāḥ sopāyamantravit
GE07mbh_15_u:011.012a: prakṛtīnāṃ ca kaunteya rājā dīnāṃ vibhāvayet
GE07mbh_15_u:011.013a: pīḍanaṃ stambhanaṃ caiva kośabhaṅgas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:011.013c: kāryaṃ yatnena śatrūṇāṃ svarāṣṭraṃ rakṣatā svayam
GE07mbh_15_u:011.014a: na ca hiṃsyo 'bhyupagataḥ sāmanto vṛddhim icchatā
GE07mbh_15_u:011.014c: kaunteya taṃ na hiṃseta yo mahīṃ vijigīṣate
GE07mbh_15_u:011.015a: gaṇānāṃ bhedane yogaṃ gacchethāḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.017a: yady evam abhiyāyāc ca durbalaṃ balavān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.018a: aśaknuvaṃs tu yuddhāya niṣpatet saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.018c: kośena paurair daṇḍena ye cānye priyakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:011.019c: krameṇānena mokṣaḥ syāc charīram api kevalam
GE07mbh_15_u:012.002c: tuṣṭapuṣṭabalaḥ śatrur ātmavān iti ca smaret
GE07mbh_15_u:012.004a: vyasanaṃ bhedanaṃ caiva śatrūṇāṃ kārayet tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:012.004c: karśanaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ caiva yuddhe cāpi bahukṣayam
GE07mbh_15_u:012.005c: ātmanaś caiva śatroś ca śaktiṃ śāstraviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:012.007a: ādadīta balaṃ rājā maulaṃ mitrabalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:012.007c: aṭavībalaṃ bhṛtaṃ caiva tathā śreṇībalaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_15_u:012.008a: tatra mitrabalaṃ rājan maulena na viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_15_u:012.008c: śreṇībalaṃ bhṛtaṃ caiva tulya eveti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:012.010c: bhavanti rājñāṃ kauravya yās tāḥ pṛthag ataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_15_u:012.011c: sāmādibhir upanyasya śamayet tān nṛpaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:012.012a: yātrāṃ yāyād balair yukto rājā ṣaḍbhiḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_15_u:012.013c: āhūtaś cāpy atho yāyād anṛtāv api pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:012.014c: padātināgair bahukardamāṃ nadīṃ; sapatnanāśe nṛpatiḥ prayāyāt
GE07mbh_15_u:012.015a: athopapattyā śakaṭaṃ padmaṃ vajraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:012.015c: uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ tatraitad vihitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:012.016c: svabhūmau yojayed yuddhaṃ parabhūmau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:012.017a: labdhaṃ praśamayed rājā nikṣiped dhanino narān
GE07mbh_15_u:012.017c: jñātvā svaviṣayaṃ taṃ ca sāmādibhir upakramet
GE07mbh_15_u:012.019a: evaṃ kurvañ śubhā vāco loke 'smiñ śṛṇute nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:012.019c: pretya svargaṃ tathāpnoti prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_15_u:012.020c: ubhayor lokayos tāta prāptaye nityam eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:012.021a: bhīṣmeṇa pūrvam ukto 'si kṛṣṇena vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_15_u:012.021c: mayāpy avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ prītyā te nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_15_u:012.022c: priyas tathā prajānāṃ tvaṃ svarge sukham avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:012.023c: pālayed vāpi dharmeṇa prajās tulyaṃ phalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_15_u:013.002a: bhīṣme svargam anuprāpte gate ca madhusūdane
GE07mbh_15_u:013.002c: vidure saṃjaye caiva ko 'nyo māṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:013.003a: yat tu mām anuśāstīha bhavān adya hite sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.003c: kartāsmy etan mahīpāla nirvṛto bhava bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:013.004a: evam uktaḥ sa rājarṣir dharmarājena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.005a: putra viśramyatāṃ tāvan mamāpi balavāñ śramaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.005c: ity uktvā prāviśad rājā gāndhāryā bhavanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.008a: gāndhāry aham anujñātaḥ svayaṃ pitrā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.009a: ahaṃ hi nāma sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ durdyūtadevinām
GE07mbh_15_u:013.009f-0028_01: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sa tān sarvān pretakāryārtham abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:013.010a: ity uktvā dharmarājāya preṣayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.010c: sa ca tadvacanāt sarvaṃ samāninye mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.011a: tato niṣkramya nṛpatis tasmād antaḥpurāt tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.011c: sarvaṃ suhṛjjanaṃ caiva sarvāś ca prakṛtīs tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.011e: samavetāṃś ca tān sarvān paurajānapadān atha
GE07mbh_15_u:013.011f-0030_01: tān āgatān abhiprekṣya samastaṃ ca suhṛjjanam
GE07mbh_15_u:013.013c: kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.015a: yad idānīm ahaṃ brūyām asmin kāla upasthite
GE07mbh_15_u:013.015c: tathā bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam avicārya vaco mama
GE07mbh_15_u:013.016e: bhavanto 'py anujānantu mā vo 'nyā bhūd vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_15_u:013.017a: asmākaṃ bhavatāṃ caiva yeyaṃ prītir hi śāśvatī
GE07mbh_15_u:013.017c: na cānyeṣv asti deśeṣu rājñām iti matir mama
GE07mbh_15_u:013.019a: yudhiṣṭhiragate rājye prāptaś cāsmi sukhaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_15_u:013.020a: mama tv andhasya vṛddhasya hataputrasya kā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:013.020c: ṛte vanaṃ mahābhāgās tan mānujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_15_u:013.021a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarve te kurujāṅgalāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.001a: śaṃtanuḥ pālayām āsa yathāvat pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_15_u:014.001e: pālayām āsa vas tāto viditaṃ vo nasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.001f-0031_01: anantaraṃ sa pāṇḍuś ca pālayām āsa medinīm
GE07mbh_15_u:014.002a: yathā ca pāṇḍur bhrātā me dayito bhavatām abhūt
GE07mbh_15_u:014.002c: sa cāpi pālayām āsa yathāvat tac ca vettha ha
GE07mbh_15_u:014.002d-0032_02: nātra kiṃ cin mṛṣā jātu bhaviteti matir mama
GE07mbh_15_u:014.003a: mayā ca bhavatāṃ samyak chuśrūṣā yā kṛtānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.003c: asamyag vā mahābhāgās tat kṣantavyam atandritaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.004a: yac ca duryodhanenedaṃ rājyaṃ bhuktam akaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_15_u:014.004c: api tatra na vo mando durbuddhir aparāddhavān
GE07mbh_15_u:014.005c: vimardaḥ sumahān āsīd anayān matkṛtād atha
GE07mbh_15_u:014.005d-0033_01: ghātitāḥ kuravo yac ca pṛthivī ca vināśitā
GE07mbh_15_u:014.006a: tan mayā sādhu vāpīdaṃ yadi vāsādhu vai kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:014.006c: tad vo hṛdi na kartavyaṃ mām anujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_15_u:014.008a: iyaṃ ca kṛpaṇā vṛddhā hataputrā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:014.008c: gāndhārī putraśokārtā tulyaṃ yācati vo mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:014.009a: hataputrāv imau vṛddhau viditvā duḥkhitau tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:014.009c: anujānīta bhadraṃ vo vrajāvaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.010a: ayaṃ ca kauravo rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.010c: sarvair bhavadbhir draṣṭavyaḥ sameṣu viṣameṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:014.010e: na jātu viṣamaṃ caiva gamiṣyati kadā cana
GE07mbh_15_u:014.013a: avaśyam eva vaktavyam iti kṛtvā bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.013c: eṣa nyāso mayā dattaḥ sarveṣāṃ vo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.013e: bhavanto 'sya ca vīrasya nyāsabhūtā mayā kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.014a: yady eva taiḥ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cid vyalīkaṃ vā sutair mama
GE07mbh_15_u:014.014c: yady anyena madīyena tad anujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_15_u:014.015a: bhavadbhir hi na me manyuḥ kṛtapūrvaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_15_u:014.017a: ity uktās tena te rājñā paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.017b-0036_01: ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:014.017c: nocur bāṣpakalāḥ kiṃ cid vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_15_u:015.001a: evam uktās tu te tena paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.002a: tūṣṇīṃbhūtāṃs tatas tāṃs tu bāṣpakaṇṭhān mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.003a: vṛddhaṃ māṃ hataputraṃ ca dharmapatnyā sahānayā
GE07mbh_15_u:015.005c: gāndhāryā sahitaṃ tan māṃ samanujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_15_u:015.006a: śrutvā tu kururājasya vākyāni karuṇāni te
GE07mbh_15_u:015.007a: uttarīyaiḥ karaiś cāpi saṃchādya vadanāni te
GE07mbh_15_u:015.009c: śanaiḥ śanais tadānyonyam abruvan svamatāny uta
GE07mbh_15_u:015.010a: tataḥ saṃdhāya te sarve vākyāny atha samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.012a: anumānya mahārājaṃ tat sadaḥ saṃprabhāṣya ca
GE07mbh_15_u:015.012c: vipraḥ pragalbho medhāvī sa rājānam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_15_u:015.013a: rājan vākyaṃ janasyāsya mayi sarvaṃ samarpitam
GE07mbh_15_u:015.013c: vakṣyāmi tad ahaṃ vīra taj juṣasva narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:015.014a: yathā vadasi rājendra sarvam etat tathā vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:015.014c: nātra mithyā vacaḥ kiṃ cit suhṛt tvaṃ naḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_15_u:015.015a: na jātv asya tu vaṃśasya rājñāṃ kaś cit kadā cana
GE07mbh_15_u:015.015c: rājāsīd yaḥ prajāpālaḥ prajānām apriyo bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:015.016a: pitṛvad bhrātṛvac caiva bhavantaḥ pālayanti naḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.016c: na ca duryodhanaḥ kiṃ cid ayuktaṃ kṛtavān nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:015.017c: tathā kuru mahārāja sa hi naḥ paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.019a: yathā śaṃtanunā guptā rājñā citrāṅgadena ca
GE07mbh_15_u:015.021a: na svalpam api putras te vyalīkaṃ kṛtavān nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:015.021e: vayam āsma yathā samyag bhavato viditaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:015.024c: nātra vācyaṃ mahārāja susūkṣmam api vidyate
GE07mbh_15_u:015.025a: uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ nityaṃ bhavatā paripālitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:015.025c: susūkṣmaṃ ca vyalīkaṃ te saputrasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_15_u:015.026a: yat tu jñātivimarde 'sminn āttha duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:016.001a: na tad duryodhanakṛtaṃ na ca tad bhavatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:016.001c: na karṇasaubalābhyāṃ ca kuravo yat kṣayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.002a: daivaṃ tat tu vijānīmo yan na śakyaṃ prabādhitum
GE07mbh_15_u:016.008a: na sa rājāparādhnoti putras tava mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.008b-0038_01: na sa rājñāṃ vadhe sūnuḥ kāraṇaṃ te mahātmanām
GE07mbh_15_u:016.008c: na bhavān na ca te bhṛtyā na karṇo na ca saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.009a: yad vinaṣṭāḥ kuruśreṣṭhā rājānaś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.009c: sarvaṃ daivakṛtaṃ tad vai ko 'tra kiṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:016.010a: gurur mato bhavān asya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.012a: prāpsyate ca bhavān puṇyaṃ dharme ca paramāṃ sthitim
GE07mbh_15_u:016.012b-0039_01: tad eva puṇyaṃ dharme ca dharme ca paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_15_u:016.012c: veda puṇyaṃ ca kārtsnyena samyag bharatasattama
GE07mbh_15_u:016.012d-0040_01: veda dharmaṃ mahābāho laukyaṃ vaidikam eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:016.013b-0041_01: dṛṣṭipradānam api te pāṇḍavān prati no vṛthā
GE07mbh_15_u:016.013c: samarthās tridivasyāpi pālane kiṃ punaḥ kṣiteḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.017a: apy amitre dayāvāṃś ca śuciś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:016.017c: ṛju paśyati medhāvī putravat pāti naḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:016.018a: vipriyaṃ ca janasyāsya saṃsargād dharmajasya vai
GE07mbh_15_u:016.019c: vīryavanto mahātmānaḥ paurāṇāṃ ca hite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.020a: na kuntī na ca pāñcālī na colūpī na sātvatī
GE07mbh_15_u:016.020c: asmiñ jane kariṣyanti pratikūlāni karhi cit
GE07mbh_15_u:016.023a: sa rājan mānasaṃ duḥkham apanīya yudhiṣṭhirāt
GE07mbh_15_u:016.023c: kuru kāryāṇi dharmyāṇi namas te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:016.024c: sādhu sādhv iti sarvaḥ sa janaḥ pratigṛhītavān
GE07mbh_15_u:016.025a: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca tad vākyam abhipūjya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.025c: visarjayām āsa tadā sarvās tu prakṛtīḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.026a: sa taiḥ saṃpūjito rājā śivenāvekṣitas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:016.026c: prāñjaliḥ pūjayām āsa taṃ janaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:016.027a: tato viveśa bhuvanaṃ gāndhāryā sahito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:016.027c: vyuṣṭāyāṃ caiva śarvaryāṃ yac cakāra nibodha tat
GE07mbh_15_u:016.027d-0042_01: āgatāyāṃ ca śarvaryāṃ sukhaṃ śete narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.003c: gamiṣyati vanaṃ rājan kārttikīm āgatām imām
GE07mbh_15_u:017.004a: sa tvā kurukulaśreṣṭha kiṃ cid artham abhīpsati
GE07mbh_15_u:017.004c: śrāddham icchati dātuṃ sa gāṅgeyasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.005c: putrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ ye cāsya suhṛdo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.006a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ vidurasya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.006c: hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa guḍākeśaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.007a: na tu bhīmo dṛḍhakrodhas tad vaco jagṛhe tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:017.008c: kirīṭī kiṃ cid ānamya bhīmaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:017.009a: bhīma rājā pitā vṛddho vanavāsāya dīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.010a: bhavatā nirjitaṃ vittaṃ dātum icchati kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.011a: diṣṭyā tv adya mahābāho dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ prayācati
GE07mbh_15_u:017.011c: yācito yaḥ purāsmābhiḥ paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_15_u:017.012a: yo 'sau pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyā bhartā bhūtvā narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.013a: mā te 'nyat puruṣavyāghra dānād bhavatu darśanam
GE07mbh_15_u:017.013c: ayaśasyam ato 'nyat syād adharmyaṃ ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_15_u:017.014c: arhas tvam asi dātuṃ vai nādātuṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:017.015a: bhīmasenas tu sakrodhaḥ provācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:017.016c: bāhlīkasya ca rājarṣer droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.017a: anyeṣāṃ caiva suhṛdāṃ kuntī karṇāya dāsyati
GE07mbh_15_u:017.018a: iti me vartate buddhir mā vo nandantu śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.018e: yair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā ghātitā kulapāṃsanaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.019a: kutas tvam adya vismṛtya vairaṃ dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_15_u:017.019e: kva tadā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sneho 'smāsv abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:017.020e: kva tadā droṇabhīṣmau tau somadatto 'pi vābhavat
GE07mbh_15_u:017.021a: yatra trayodaśa samā vane vanyena jīvasi
GE07mbh_15_u:017.021c: na tadā tvā pitā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛtvenābhivīkṣate
GE07mbh_15_u:017.022a: kiṃ te tad vismṛtaṃ pārtha yad eṣa kulapāṃsanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:017.022c: durvṛtto viduraṃ prāha dyūte kiṃ jitam ity uta
GE07mbh_15_u:017.023c: uvāca bhrātaraṃ dhīmāñ joṣam āsveti bhartsayan
GE07mbh_15_u:018.001a: bhīma jyeṣṭho gurur me tvaṃ nāto 'nyad vaktum utsahe
GE07mbh_15_u:018.001c: dhṛtarāṣṭro hi rājarṣiḥ sarvathā mānam arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:018.002a: na smaranty aparāddhāni smaranti sukṛtāni ca
GE07mbh_15_u:018.002d-0043_01: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā phalgunasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.003a: idaṃ madvacanāt kṣattaḥ kauravaṃ brūhi pārthivam
GE07mbh_15_u:018.003c: yāvad icchati putrāṇāṃ dātuṃ tāvad dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_15_u:018.004c: mama kośād iti vibho mā bhūd bhīmaḥ sudurmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.005a: ity ukte dharmarājas tam arjunaṃ pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_15_u:018.006a: tataḥ sa viduraṃ dhīmān vākyam āha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.006c: na bhīmasene kopaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:018.007c: duḥkhair bahuvidhair dhīmān araṇye viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_15_u:018.008a: kiṃ tu madvacanād brūhi rājānaṃ bharatarṣabham
GE07mbh_15_u:018.008c: yad yad icchasi yāvac ca gṛhyatāṃ madgṛhād iti
GE07mbh_15_u:018.009a: yan mātsaryam ayaṃ bhīmaḥ karoti bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.009c: na tan manasi kartavyam iti vācyaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.010a: yan mamāsti dhanaṃ kiṃ cid arjunasya ca veśmani
GE07mbh_15_u:018.010c: tasya svāmī mahārāja iti vācyaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.011a: dadātu rājā viprebhyo yatheṣṭaṃ kriyatāṃ vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.011c: putrāṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva gacchatv ānṛṇyam adya saḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:018.012a: idaṃ cāpi śarīraṃ me tavāyattaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:018.012c: dhanāni ceti viddhi tvaṃ kṣattar nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.001a: evam uktas tu rājñā sa viduro buddhisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.002c: sa ca saṃśrutya vākyaṃ te praśaśaṃsa mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.003a: bībhatsuś ca mahātejā nivedayati te gṛhān
GE07mbh_15_u:019.003c: vasu tasya gṛhe yac ca prāṇān api ca kevalān
GE07mbh_15_u:019.004a: dharmarājaś ca putras te rājyaṃ prāṇān dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_15_u:019.004c: anujānāti rājarṣe yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_15_u:019.004d-0044_01: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca tad anujñātavān vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:019.005a: bhīmas tu sarvaduḥkhāni saṃsmṛtya bahulāny uta
GE07mbh_15_u:019.006a: sa rājñā dharmaśīlena bhrātrā bībhatsunā tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:019.007a: na ca manyus tvayā kārya iti tvāṃ prāha dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.007c: saṃsmṛtya bhīmas tad vairaṃ yad anyāyavad ācaret
GE07mbh_15_u:019.009a: vṛkodarakṛte cāham arjunaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.009c: prasādayāva nṛpate bhavān prabhur ihāsti yat
GE07mbh_15_u:019.010a: pradadātu bhavān vittaṃ yāvad icchasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:019.010c: tvam īśvaro no rājyasya prāṇānāṃ ceti bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:019.011c: ito ratnāni gāś caiva dāsīdāsam ajāvikam
GE07mbh_15_u:019.013c: gavāṃ nipānāny anyac ca vividhaṃ puṇyakarma yat
GE07mbh_15_u:019.014a: iti mām abravīd rājā pārthaś caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:019.014c: yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:019.015d-0045_03: gantuṃ sa cakre vanam eva vegāt
GE07mbh_15_u:020.001c: prītimān abhavad rājā rājño jiṣṇoś ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_15_u:020.002c: putrārthe suhṛdāṃ caiva sa samīkṣya sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:020.004c: alaṃkārān gajān aśvān kanyāś caiva varastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:020.005a: droṇaṃ saṃkīrtya bhīṣmaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_15_u:020.005c: duryodhanaṃ ca rājānaṃ putrāṃś caiva pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_15_u:020.007a: aniśaṃ yatra puruṣā gaṇakā lekhakās tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:020.007c: yudhiṣṭhirasya vacanāt tad āpṛcchanti taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:020.008a: ājñāpaya kim etebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ dīyatām iti
GE07mbh_15_u:020.009a: śate deye daśaśataṃ sahasre cāyutaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:020.010c: tarpayām āsa viprāṃs tān varṣan bhūmim ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:020.014a: evaṃ sa putrapautrāṇāṃ pitṝṇām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:020.015a: pariśrānto yadāsīt sa dadad dānāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:020.016a: evaṃ sa rājā kauravyaś cakre dānamahotsavam
GE07mbh_15_u:021.004a: tataḥ striyaḥ kauravapāṇḍavānāṃ; yāś cāpy anyāḥ kauravarājavaṃśyāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.004c: tāsāṃ nādaḥ prādurāsīt tadānīṃ; vaicitravīrye nṛpatau prayāte
GE07mbh_15_u:021.005a: tato lājaiḥ sumanobhiś ca rājā; vicitrābhis tad gṛhaṃ pūjayitvā
GE07mbh_15_u:021.005c: saṃyojyārthair bhṛtyajanaṃ ca sarvaṃ; tataḥ samutsṛjya yayau narendraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.006a: tato rājā prāñjalir vepamāno; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ sasvanaṃ bāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.006c: vilapyoccair hā mahārāja sādho; kva gantāsīty apatat tāta bhūmau
GE07mbh_15_u:021.007a: tathārjunas tīvraduḥkhābhitapto; muhur muhur niḥśvasan bhāratāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.007c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ maivam ity evam uktvā; nigṛhyāthodīdharat sīdamānaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.008a: vṛkodaraḥ phalgunaś caiva vīrau; mādrīputrau viduraḥ saṃjayaś ca
GE07mbh_15_u:021.008c: vaiśyāputraḥ sahito gautamena; dhaumyo viprāś cānvayur bāṣpakaṇṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.009a: kuntī gāndhārīṃ baddhanetrāṃ vrajantīṃ; skandhāsaktaṃ hastam athodvahantī
GE07mbh_15_u:021.009c: rājā gāndhāryāḥ skandhadeśe 'vasajya; pāṇiṃ yayau dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.010a: tathā kṛṣṇā draupadī yādavī ca; bālāpatyā cottarā kauravī ca
GE07mbh_15_u:021.010c: citrāṅgadā yāś ca kāś cit striyo 'nyāḥ; sārdhaṃ rājñā prasthitās tā vadhūbhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.011a: tāsāṃ nādo rudatīnāṃ tadāsīd; rājan duḥkhāt kurarīṇām ivoccaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:021.011c: tato niṣpetur brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ; viṭśūdrāṇāṃ caiva nāryaḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_15_u:021.012a: tanniryāṇe duḥkhitaḥ pauravargo; gajāhvaye 'tīva babhūva rājan
GE07mbh_15_u:021.012c: yathā pūrvaṃ gacchatāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; dyūte rājan kauravāṇāṃ sabhāyām
GE07mbh_15_u:021.013a: yā nāpaśyac candramā naiva sūryo; rāmāḥ kadā cid api tasmin narendre
GE07mbh_15_u:021.013c: mahāvanaṃ gacchati kauravendre; śokenārtā rājamārgaṃ prapeduḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.001c: strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca sumahān nisvano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_15_u:022.002c: kathaṃ cin niryayau dhīmān vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.003c: visarjayām āsa ca taṃ janaughaṃ sa muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.004a: vanaṃ gantuṃ ca viduro rājñā saha kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.004c: saṃjayaś ca mahāmātraḥ sūto gāvalgaṇis tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.005a: kṛpaṃ nivartayām āsa yuyutsuṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_15_u:022.006a: nivṛtte pauravarge tu rājā sāntaḥpuras tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.008c: rājā yātv eṣa dharmātmā tapase dhṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.009c: jagādaivaṃ tadā kuntī gāndhārīṃ parigṛhya ha
GE07mbh_15_u:022.010a: sahadeve mahārāja mā pramādaṃ kṛthāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_15_u:022.010c: eṣa mām anurakto hi rājaṃs tvāṃ caiva nityadā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.011c: avakīrṇo hi sa mayā vīro duṣprajñayā tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.012a: āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ mandāyā mama putraka
GE07mbh_15_u:022.012c: yat sūryajam apaśyantyāḥ śatadhā na vidīryate
GE07mbh_15_u:022.013a: evaṃgate tu kiṃ śakyaṃ mayā kartum ariṃdama
GE07mbh_15_u:022.013c: mama doṣo 'yam atyarthaṃ khyāpito yan na sūryajaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.013e: tannimittaṃ mahābāho dānaṃ dadyās tvam uttamam
GE07mbh_15_u:022.014c: draupadyāś ca priye nityaṃ sthātavyam arikarśana
GE07mbh_15_u:022.015c: samādheyās tvayā vīra tvayy adya kuladhūr gatā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.016a: śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ pādāñ śuśrūṣantī vane tv aham
GE07mbh_15_u:022.017a: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vaśī
GE07mbh_15_u:022.017c: viṣādam agamat tīvraṃ na ca kiṃ cid uvāca ha
GE07mbh_15_u:022.018a: sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.019a: kim idaṃ te vyavasitaṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:022.019c: na tvām abhyanujānāmi prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:022.020a: vyarocayaḥ purā hy asmān utsāhya priyadarśane
GE07mbh_15_u:022.020c: vidurāyā vacobhis tvam asmān na tyaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:022.021a: nihatya pṛthivīpālān rājyaṃ prāptam idaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.022a: kva sā buddhir iyaṃ cādya bhavatyā yā śrutā mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.022c: kṣatradharme sthitiṃ hy uktvā tasyāś calitum icchasi
GE07mbh_15_u:022.023a: asmān utsṛjya rājyaṃ ca snuṣāṃ cemāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_15_u:022.023c: kathaṃ vatsyasi śūnyeṣu vaneṣv amba prasīda me
GE07mbh_15_u:022.024a: iti bāṣpakalāṃ vācaṃ kuntī putrasya śṛṇvatī
GE07mbh_15_u:022.025a: yadā rājyam idaṃ kunti bhoktavyaṃ putranirjitam
GE07mbh_15_u:022.025c: prāptavyā rājadharmāś ca tadeyaṃ te kuto matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:022.026a: kiṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ pūrvaṃ bhavatyā pṛthivīkṣayam
GE07mbh_15_u:022.026c: kasya hetoḥ parityajya vanaṃ gantum abhīpsasi
GE07mbh_15_u:022.027a: vanāc cāpi kim ānītā bhavatyā bālakā vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:022.028a: prasīda mātar mā gās tvaṃ vanam adya yaśasvini
GE07mbh_15_u:022.031a: sā putrān rudataḥ sarvān muhur muhur avekṣatī
GE07mbh_15_u:022.032a: anvayuḥ pāṇḍavās tāṃ tu sabhṛtyāntaḥpurās tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:022.032c: tataḥ pramṛjya sāśrūṇi putrān vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:023.001a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_15_u:023.001c: kṛtam uddharṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā vaḥ sīdatāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:023.003a: kathaṃ pāṇḍor na naśyeta saṃtatiḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:023.003c: yaśaś ca vo na naśyeta iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.004c: mā pareṣāṃ mukhaprekṣāḥ sthety evaṃ tat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:023.005a: kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho rājā tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:023.005c: punar vane na duḥkhī syā iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.006c: nāyaṃ bhīmo 'tyayaṃ gacched iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.008c: kṣudhā kathaṃ na sīdetām iti coddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.009a: iyaṃ ca bṛhatī śyāmā śrīmaty āyatalocanā
GE07mbh_15_u:023.009c: vṛthā sabhātale kliṣṭā mā bhūd iti ca tat kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.010a: prekṣantyā me tadā hīmāṃ vepantīṃ kadalīm iva
GE07mbh_15_u:023.011c: tadaiva viditaṃ mahyaṃ parābhūtam idaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.012a: viṣaṇṇāḥ kuravaś caiva tadā me śvaśurādayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:023.012c: yadaiṣā nātham icchantī vyalapat kurarī yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:023.013c: yadā duḥśāsanenaiṣā tadā muhyāmy ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:023.014c: tadānīṃ vidurāvākyair iti tad vitta putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:023.015a: kathaṃ na rājavaṃśo 'yaṃ naśyet prāpya sutān mama
GE07mbh_15_u:023.015c: pāṇḍor iti mayā putra tasmād uddharṣaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.016a: na tasya putraḥ pautrau vā kuta eva sa pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:023.016c: labhate sukṛtāṃl lokān yasmād vaṃśaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_15_u:023.017a: bhuktaṃ rājyaphalaṃ putrā bhartur me vipulaṃ purā
GE07mbh_15_u:023.018c: vidurāyāḥ pralāpais taiḥ plāvanārthaṃ tu tat kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:023.019c: patilokān ahaṃ puṇyān kāmaye tapasā vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:023.021c: dharme te dhīyatāṃ buddhir manas te mahad astu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:024.001a: kuntyās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavā rājasattama
GE07mbh_15_u:024.002a: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt sarveṣām eva bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:024.003c: abhivādya nyavartanta pṛthāṃ tām anivartya vai
GE07mbh_15_u:024.004c: gāndhārīṃ viduraṃ caiva samābhāṣya nigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_15_u:024.005c: yathā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha tat sarvaṃ satyam eva hi
GE07mbh_15_u:024.006a: putraiśvaryaṃ mahad idam apāsya ca mahāphalam
GE07mbh_15_u:024.006c: kā nu gacched vanaṃ durgaṃ putrān utsṛjya mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_15_u:024.007a: rājyasthayā tapas taptaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ vrataṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:024.007c: anayā śakyam adyeha śrūyatāṃ ca vaco mama
GE07mbh_15_u:024.008c: tasmāt tvam enāṃ dharmajñe samanujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:024.009a: ity uktā saubaleyī tu rājñā kuntīm uvāca ha
GE07mbh_15_u:024.009c: tat sarvaṃ rājavacanaṃ svaṃ ca vākyaṃ viśeṣavat
GE07mbh_15_u:024.010a: na ca sā vanavāsāya devīṃ kṛtamatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:024.011a: tasyās tu taṃ sthiraṃ jñātvā vyavasāyaṃ kurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:024.011c: nivṛttāṃś ca kuruśreṣṭhān dṛṣṭvā prarurudus tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:024.012c: yayau rājā mahāprājño dhṛtarāṣṭro vanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:024.013c: yānaiḥ strīsahitāḥ sarve puraṃ praviviśus tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:024.015c: kuntyā hīnāḥ suduḥkhārtā vatsā iva vinākṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:024.016a: dhṛtarāṣṭras tu tenāhnā gatvā sumahad antaram
GE07mbh_15_u:024.017e: prāduṣkṛtāgnir abhavat sa ca vṛddho narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:024.018a: sa rājāgnīn paryupāsya hutvā ca vidhivat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:024.019a: viduraḥ saṃjayaś caiva rājñaḥ śayyāṃ kuśais tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:024.020a: gāndhāryāḥ saṃnikarṣe tu niṣasāda kuśeṣv atha
GE07mbh_15_u:024.021c: yājakāś ca yathoddeśaṃ dvijā ye cānuyāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:024.023c: hutvāgniṃ vidhivat sarve prayayus te yathākramam
GE07mbh_15_u:025.001c: nivāsam akarod rājā vidurasya mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.003a: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā kathābhir abhinandya tān
GE07mbh_15_u:025.003c: anujajñe saśiṣyān vai vidhivat pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_15_u:025.004a: sāyāhne sa mahīpālas tato gaṅgām upetya ha
GE07mbh_15_u:025.004c: cakāra vidhivac chaucaṃ gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:025.005a: tathaivānye pṛthak sarve tīrtheṣv āplutya bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:025.005c: cakruḥ sarvāḥ kriyās tatra puruṣā vidurādayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.006c: gāndhārīṃ ca pṛthā rājan gaṅgātīram upānayat
GE07mbh_15_u:025.007a: rājñas tu yājakais tatra kṛto vedīparistaraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.007c: juhāva tatra vahniṃ sa nṛpatiḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.010a: sa hi rājā mahān āsīt kekayeṣu paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.010c: sa putraṃ manujaiśvarye niveśya vanam āviśat
GE07mbh_15_u:025.011a: tenāsau sahito rājā yayau vyāsāśramaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:025.012a: sa dīkṣāṃ tatra saṃprāpya rājā kauravanandanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.013a: tasmai sarvaṃ vidhiṃ rājan rājācakhyau mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.014a: evaṃ sa tapasā rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.014c: yojayām āsa cātmānaṃ tāṃś cāpy anucarāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:025.016a: karmaṇā manasā vācā cakṣuṣā cāpi te nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:025.017c: sa pārthivas tatra tapaś cacāra; maharṣivat tīvram apetadoṣaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:025.018a: kṣattā ca dharmārthavid agryabuddhiḥ; sasaṃjayas taṃ nṛpatiṃ sadāram
GE07mbh_15_u:025.018c: upācarad ghoratapo jitātmā; tadā kṛśo valkalacīravāsāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.001a: tatas tasmin muniśreṣṭhā rājānaṃ draṣṭum abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.001c: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva devalaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.002a: dvaipāyanaḥ saśiṣyaś ca siddhāś cānye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.003a: teṣāṃ kuntī mahārāja pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_15_u:026.003c: te cāpi tutuṣus tasyās tāpasāḥ paricaryayā
GE07mbh_15_u:026.004a: tatra dharmyāḥ kathās tāta cakrus te paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.005a: kathāntare tu kasmiṃś cid devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:026.007a: sa putre rājyam āsajya jyeṣṭhe paramadhārmike
GE07mbh_15_u:026.008a: sa gatvā tapasaḥ pāraṃ dīptasya sa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.009a: dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ sa bahuśo rājan saṃpatatā mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:026.011c: sa cāpi tapasā lebhe nākapṛṣṭham ito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.012a: asminn araṇye nṛpate māndhātur api cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.013a: bhāryā samabhavad yasya narmadā saritāṃ varā
GE07mbh_15_u:026.013c: so 'sminn araṇye nṛpatis tapas taptvā divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.014c: sa cāpy asmin vane taptvā tapo divam avāptavān
GE07mbh_15_u:026.015c: rājann avāpya duṣprāpāṃ siddhim agryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:026.016a: tvaṃ cāpi rājaśārdūla tapaso 'nte śriyā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.017a: pāṇḍuḥ smarati nityaṃ ca balahantuḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.017c: tvāṃ sadaiva mahīpāla sa tvāṃ śreyasi yokṣyati
GE07mbh_15_u:026.018a: tava śuśrūṣayā caiva gāndhāryāś ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:026.018c: bhartuḥ salokatāṃ kuntī gamiṣyati vadhūs tava
GE07mbh_15_u:026.019a: yudhiṣṭhirasya jananī sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:026.021a: etac chrutvā kauravendro mahātmā; sahaiva patnyā prītimān pratyagṛhṇāt
GE07mbh_15_u:026.021c: vidvān vākyaṃ nāradasya praśasya; cakre pūjāṃ cātulāṃ nāradāya
GE07mbh_15_u:026.022a: tathā sarve nāradaṃ viprasaṃghāḥ; saṃpūjayām āsur atīva rājan
GE07mbh_15_u:026.022c: rājñaḥ prītyā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya te vai; punaḥ punaḥ samahṛṣṭās tadānīm
GE07mbh_15_u:027.001a: nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ praśaśaṃsur dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:027.001c: śatayūpas tu rājarṣir nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:027.002c: sarvasya ca janasyāsya mama caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_15_u:027.003a: asti kā cid vivakṣā tu mama tāṃ gadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_15_u:027.004c: yuktaḥ paśyasi devarṣe gatīr vai vividhā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_15_u:027.005c: na tv asya nṛpater lokāḥ kathitās te mahāmune
GE07mbh_15_u:027.006a: sthānam asya kṣitipateḥ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:027.006c: tvattaḥ kīdṛk kadā veti tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:027.007a: ity ukto nāradas tena vākyaṃ sarvamanonugam
GE07mbh_15_u:027.008c: dṛṣṭavān asmi rājarṣe tatra pāṇḍuṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_15_u:027.009c: tapaso duścarasyāsya yad ayaṃ tapyate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:027.010a: tatrāham idam aśrauṣaṃ śakrasya vadato nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:027.013c: svacchandeneti dharmātmā yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_15_u:027.014a: devaguhyam idaṃ prītyā mayā vaḥ kathitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_15_u:027.015a: iti te tasya tac chrutvā devarṣer madhuraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:027.015c: sarve sumanasaḥ prītā babhūvuḥ sa ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:028.002a: tathā paurajanaḥ sarvaḥ śocann āste janādhipam
GE07mbh_15_u:028.002c: kurvāṇāś ca kathās tatra brāhmaṇā nṛpatiṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:028.002d-0048_01: tatra tatra kathā hy āsan dvijānāṃ kauravān prati
GE07mbh_15_u:028.003a: kathaṃ nu rājā vṛddhaḥ sa vane vasati nirjane
GE07mbh_15_u:028.003c: gāndhārī ca mahābhāgā sā ca kuntī pṛthā katham
GE07mbh_15_u:028.004a: sukhārhaḥ sa hi rājarṣir na sukhaṃ tan mahāvanam
GE07mbh_15_u:028.006a: viduraḥ kimavasthaś ca bhrātuḥ śuśrūṣur ātmavān
GE07mbh_15_u:028.007c: tatra tatra kathāś cakruḥ samāsādya parasparam
GE07mbh_15_u:028.008a: pāṇḍavāś caiva te sarve bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:028.008c: śocanto mātaraṃ vṛddhām ūṣur nāticiraṃ pure
GE07mbh_15_u:028.009c: gāndhārīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ viduraṃ ca mahāmatim
GE07mbh_15_u:028.010a: naiṣāṃ babhūva saṃprītis tān vicintayatāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:028.010c: na rājye na ca nārīṣu na vedādhyayane tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:028.011c: tac ca jñātivadhaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsmarantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:028.014c: sadaiva cintayantas te na nidrām upalebhire
GE07mbh_15_u:028.015a: draupadī hataputrā ca subhadrā caiva bhāminī
GE07mbh_15_u:028.016a: vairāṭyās tu sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitaraṃ te parikṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:028.016c: dhārayanti sma te prāṇāṃs tava pūrvapitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.002c: te rājakāryāṇi tadā nākārṣuḥ sarvataḥ pure
GE07mbh_15_u:029.003a: āviṣṭā iva śokena nābhyanandanta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_15_u:029.003c: saṃbhāṣyamāṇā api te na kiṃ cit pratyapūjayan
GE07mbh_15_u:029.004a: te sma vīrā durādharṣā gāmbhīrye sāgaropamāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.005c: kathaṃ nu vṛddhamithunaṃ vahaty adya pṛthā kṛśā
GE07mbh_15_u:029.006a: kathaṃ ca sa mahīpālo hataputro nirāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.006c: patnyā saha vasaty eko vane śvāpadasevite
GE07mbh_15_u:029.007a: sā ca devī mahābhāgā gāndhārī hatabāndhavā
GE07mbh_15_u:029.007c: patim andhaṃ kathaṃ vṛddham anveti vijane vane
GE07mbh_15_u:029.008a: evaṃ teṣāṃ kathayatām autsukyam abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:029.009c: aho me bhavato dṛṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ gamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:029.010a: na hi tvā gauraveṇāham aśakaṃ vaktum ātmanā
GE07mbh_15_u:029.010c: gamanaṃ prati rājendra tad idaṃ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_15_u:029.011a: diṣṭyā drakṣyāmi tāṃ kuntīṃ vartayantīṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_15_u:029.012c: kadā nu jananīṃ śrāntāṃ drakṣyāmi bhṛśaduḥkhitām
GE07mbh_15_u:029.013c: kuntī rājasutā yatra vasaty asukhinī vane
GE07mbh_15_u:029.015a: kadā drakṣyāmi tāṃ devīṃ yadi jīvati sā pṛthā
GE07mbh_15_u:029.015c: jīvantyā hy adya naḥ prītir bhaviṣyati narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:029.016a: eṣā te 'stu matir nityaṃ dharme te ramatāṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.016c: yo 'dya tvam asmān rājendra śreyasā yojayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:029.017c: kāṅkṣantaṃ darśanaṃ kuntyā gāndhāryāḥ śvaśurasya ca
GE07mbh_15_u:029.018a: ity uktaḥ sa nṛpo devyā pāñcālyā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:029.020a: stryadhyakṣāṃś cābravīd rājā yānāni vividhāni me
GE07mbh_15_u:029.022a: yaś ca paurajanaḥ kaś cid draṣṭum icchati pārthivam
GE07mbh_15_u:029.022c: anāvṛtaḥ suvihitaḥ sa ca yātu surakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.023a: sūdāḥ paurogavāś caiva sarvaṃ caiva mahānasam
GE07mbh_15_u:029.023c: vividhaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ ca śakaṭair uhyatāṃ mama
GE07mbh_15_u:029.024a: prayāṇaṃ ghuṣyatāṃ caiva śvobhūta iti mā ciram
GE07mbh_15_u:029.024c: kriyantāṃ pathi cāpy adya veśmāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_15_u:029.025a: evam ājñāpya rājā sa bhrātṛbhiḥ saha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:029.026a: sa bahir divasān evaṃ janaughaṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_15_u:029.026c: nyavasan nṛpatiḥ pañca tato 'gacchad vanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:030.002a: yogo yoga iti prītyā tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_15_u:030.002c: krośatāṃ sādināṃ tatra yujyatāṃ yujyatām iti
GE07mbh_15_u:030.003a: ke cid yānair narā jagmuḥ ke cid aśvair manojavaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.004a: gajendraiś ca tathaivānye ke cid uṣṭrair narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:030.006a: sa cāpi rājavacanād ācāryo gautamaḥ kṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.006c: senām ādāya senānī prayayāv āśramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:030.007a: tato dvijair vṛtaḥ śrīmān kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.011c: vaśī śvetair hayair divyair yuktenānvagaman nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:030.013c: śuśubhe pāṇḍavaṃ sainyaṃ tat tadā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:030.014a: nadītīreṣu ramyeṣu saratsu ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_15_u:030.014c: vāsān kṛtvā krameṇātha jagmus te kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.015a: yuyutsuś ca mahātejā dhaumyaś caiva purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.017a: sa dadarśāśramaṃ dūrād rājarṣes tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:030.018a: tataḥ pramuditaḥ sarvo janas tad vanam añjasā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.001a: tatas te pāṇḍavā dūrād avatīrya padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.002a: sa ca paurajanaḥ sarvo ye ca rāṣṭranivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.002c: striyaś ca kurumukhyānāṃ padbhir evānvayus tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.003a: āśramaṃ te tato jagmur dhṛtarāṣṭrasya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.005a: tān apṛcchat tato rājā kvāsau kauravavaṃśabhṛt
GE07mbh_15_u:031.006a: tam ūcus te tato vākyaṃ yamunām avagāhitum
GE07mbh_15_u:031.006c: puṣpāṇām udakumbhasya cārthe gata iti prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:031.007a: tair ākhyātena mārgeṇa tatas te prayayus tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.007c: dadṛśuś cāvidūre tān sarvān atha padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.008a: tatas te satvarā jagmuḥ pitur darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.008c: sahadevas tu vegena prādhāvad yena sā pṛthā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.009a: sasvanaṃ prarudan dhīmān mātuḥ pādāv upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_15_u:031.009c: sā ca bāṣpāvilamukhī pradadarśa priyaṃ sutam
GE07mbh_15_u:031.012a: sā hy agre 'gacchata tayor daṃpatyor hataputrayoḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.012c: karṣantī tau tatas te tāṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃnyapatan bhuvi
GE07mbh_15_u:031.012d-0050_01: tayos tu pādayo rājan nyapatan hataputrayoḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.013a: tān rājā svarayogena sparśena ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.014a: tatas te bāṣpam utsṛjya gāndhārīsahitaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:031.015a: sarveṣāṃ toyakalaśāñ jagṛhus te svayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.015c: pāṇḍavā labdhasaṃjñās te mātrā cāśvāsitāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.016a: tato nāryo nṛsiṃhānāṃ sa ca yodhajanas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:031.017a: nivedayām āsa tadā janaṃ taṃ nāmagotrataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.019a: abhivādito vadhūbhiś ca kṛṣṇādyābhiḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:031.019c: gāndhāryā sahito dhīmān kuntyā ca pratyanandata
GE07mbh_15_u:032.001a: sa taiḥ saha naravyāghrair bhrātṛbhir bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:032.004a: tān ācakhyau tadā sūtaḥ sarvān nāmābhināmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.004c: saṃjayo draupadīṃ caiva sarvāś cānyāḥ kurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.005a: ya eṣa jāmbūnadaśuddhagaura;tanur mahāsiṃha iva pravṛddhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.007a: yas tv eṣa pārśve 'sya mahādhanuṣmāñ; śyāmo yuvā vāraṇayūthapābhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.008a: kuntīsamīpe puruṣottamau tu; yamāv imau viṣṇumahendrakalpau
GE07mbh_15_u:032.008c: manuṣyaloke sakale samo 'sti; yayor na rūpe na bale na śīle
GE07mbh_15_u:032.009a: iyaṃ punaḥ padmadalāyatākṣī; madhyaṃ vayaḥ kiṃ cid iva spṛśantī
GE07mbh_15_u:032.009c: nīlotpalābhā puradevateva; kṛṣṇā sthitā mūrtimatīva lakṣmīḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.010a: asyās tu pārśve kanakottamābhā; yaiṣā prabhā mūrtimatīva gaurī
GE07mbh_15_u:032.010c: madhye sthitaiṣā bhaginī dvijāgryā; cakrāyudhasyāpratimasya tasya
GE07mbh_15_u:032.011c: paspardha kṛṣṇena nṛpaḥ sadā yo; vṛkodarasyaiṣa parigraho 'gryaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.012a: iyaṃ ca rājño magadhādhipasya; sutā jarāsaṃdha iti śrutasya
GE07mbh_15_u:032.013c: bhāryā matā mādravatīsutasya; jyeṣṭhasya seyaṃ kamalāyatākṣī
GE07mbh_15_u:032.014a: iyaṃ tu niṣṭaptasuvarṇagaurī; rājño virāṭasya sutā saputrā
GE07mbh_15_u:032.014c: bhāryābhimanyor nihato raṇe yo; droṇādibhis tair viratho rathasthaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.015a: etās tu sīmantaśiroruhā yāḥ; śuklottarīyā nararājapatnyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.015c: rājño 'sya vṛddhasya paraṃśatākhyāḥ; snuṣā vivīrā hataputranāthāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.016a: etā yathāmukhyam udāhṛtā vo; brāhmaṇyabhāvād ṛjubuddhisattvāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.017a: evaṃ sa rājā kuruvṛddhavaryaḥ; samāgatas tair naradevaputraiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:032.017c: papraccha sarvān kuśalaṃ tadānīṃ; gateṣu sarveṣv atha tāpaseṣu
GE07mbh_15_u:032.018a: yodheṣu cāpy āśramamaṇḍalaṃ taṃ; muktvā niviṣṭeṣu vimucya patram
GE07mbh_15_u:032.018c: strīvṛddhabāle ca susaṃniviṣṭe; yathārhataḥ kuśalaṃ paryapṛcchat
GE07mbh_15_u:033.001a: yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho kaccit tāta kuśaly asi
GE07mbh_15_u:033.002a: ye ca tvām upajīvanti kaccit te 'pi nirāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.002c: sacivā bhṛtyavargāś ca guravaś caiva te vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:033.002d-0052_01: kaccit te 'pi nirātaṅkā vasanti viṣaye tava
GE07mbh_15_u:033.005c: śatravo guravaḥ paurā bhṛtyā vā svajano 'pi vā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.007a: kaccic ca viṣaye viprāḥ svakarmaniratās tava
GE07mbh_15_u:033.007c: kṣatriyā vaiśyavargā vā śūdrā vāpi kuṭumbinaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.007d-0053_01: sarve te āśramā varṇā dharmasthā ye ca vittamāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.008a: kaccit strībālavṛddhaṃ te na śocati na yācate
GE07mbh_15_u:033.008c: jāmayaḥ pūjitāḥ kaccit tava gehe nararṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:033.010a: ity evaṃvādinaṃ taṃ sa nyāyavit pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_15_u:033.011a: kaccit te vardhate rājaṃs tapo mandaśramasya te
GE07mbh_15_u:033.011c: api me jananī ceyaṃ śuśrūṣur vigataklamā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.011e: apy asyāḥ saphalo rājan vanavāso bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_15_u:033.012a: iyaṃ ca mātā jyeṣṭhā me vītavātādhvakarśitā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.012c: ghoreṇa tapasā yuktā devī kaccin na śocati
GE07mbh_15_u:033.013c: nāpadhyāyati vā kaccid asmān pāpakṛtaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.014a: kva cāsau viduro rājan nainaṃ paśyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:033.014c: saṃjayaḥ kuśalī cāyaṃ kaccin nu tapasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.015c: kuśalī viduraḥ putra tapo ghoraṃ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.016c: kadā cid dṛśyate vipraiḥ śūnye 'smin kānane kva cit
GE07mbh_15_u:033.017a: ity evaṃ vadatas tasya jaṭī vīṭāmukhaḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.017a-0054_02: jagāma sa vanaṃ rājā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.018b-0055_01: viduras tv eṣa dharmātmā janaṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
GE07mbh_15_u:033.019a: tam anvadhāvan nṛpatir eka eva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.019c: praviśantaṃ vanaṃ ghoraṃ lakṣyālakṣyaṃ kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_15_u:033.020a: bho bho vidura rājāhaṃ dayitas te yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.020c: iti bruvan narapatis taṃ yatnād abhyadhāvata
GE07mbh_15_u:033.021a: tato vivikta ekānte tasthau buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.021c: viduro vṛkṣam āśritya kaṃ cit tatra vanāntare
GE07mbh_15_u:033.023c: vidurasyāśrave rājā sa ca pratyāha saṃjñayā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.024c: saṃyojya viduras tasmin dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭyā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.025a: viveśa viduro dhīmān gātrair gātrāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_15_u:033.025c: prāṇān prāṇeṣu ca dadhad indriyāṇīndriyeṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:033.026a: sa yogabalam āsthāya viveśa nṛpates tanum
GE07mbh_15_u:033.028c: dharmarājo mahātejās tac ca sasmāra pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.029a: paurāṇam ātmanaḥ sarvaṃ vidyāvān sa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_15_u:033.030c: dagdhukāmo 'bhavad vidvān atha vai vāg abhāṣata
GE07mbh_15_u:033.031a: bho bho rājan na dagdhavyam etad vidurasaṃjñakam
GE07mbh_15_u:033.031c: kalevaram ihaitat te dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.031d-0057_01: na dagdhavyo na dagdhavya eṣa rājan mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.032a: lokāḥ saṃtānakā nāma bhaviṣyanty asya pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:033.033a: ity ukto dharmarājaḥ sa vinivṛtya tataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.034a: tataḥ sa rājā dyutimān sa ca sarvo janas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:033.035a: tac chrutvā prītimān rājā bhūtvā dharmajam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:033.035c: āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva mamedaṃ pratigṛhyatām
GE07mbh_15_u:033.036a: yadanno hi naro rājaṃs tadanno 'syātithiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:033.036c: ity uktaḥ sa tathety eva prāha dharmātmajo nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:033.036e: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca bubhuje rājñā dattaṃ sahānujaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.001a: evaṃ sā rajanī teṣām āśrame puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_15_u:034.002a: tatra tatra kathāś cāsaṃs teṣāṃ dharmārthalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.003a: pāṇḍavās tv abhito mātur dharaṇyāṃ suṣupus tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:034.004c: tadāhārā nṛvīrās te nyavasaṃs tāṃ niśāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:034.008c: brāhmeṇa vapuṣā yuktā yuktā munigaṇaiś ca tāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.009c: aśaṅkitaiḥ pakṣigaṇaiḥ pragītair iva ca prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:034.011a: prādhītadvijaghoṣaiś ca kva cit kva cid alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:034.012a: tataḥ sa rājā pradadau tāpasārtham upāhṛtān
GE07mbh_15_u:034.013a: ajināni praveṇīś ca sruksruvaṃ ca mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.013c: kamaṇḍalūṃs tathā sthālīḥ piṭharāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:034.014a: bhājanāni ca lauhāni pātrīś ca vividhā nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:034.014c: yad yad icchati yāvac ca yad anyad api kāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:034.014d-0059_01: tat sarvaṃ pradadau rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.015c: vasu viśrāṇya tat sarvaṃ punar āyān mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.018a: sa tam abhyarcya rājānaṃ nāma saṃśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.020a: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā śuśubhe 'tīva kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.020c: bibhrad brāhmīṃ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ devair iva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:034.022c: vṛtaḥ śiṣyair mahātejā darśayām āsa taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:034.023a: tataḥ sa rājā kauravyaḥ kuntīputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_15_u:034.026a: te ca sarve dvijaśreṣṭhā viṣṭareṣu samantataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.002a: dhṛtarāṣṭra mahābāho kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.002c: kaccin manas te prīṇāti vanavāse narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:035.003a: kaccid dhṛdi na te śoko rājan putravināśajaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.004a: kaccid buddhiṃ dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā carasy āraṇyakaṃ vidhim
GE07mbh_15_u:035.004c: kaccid vadhūś ca gāndhārī na śokenābhibhūyate
GE07mbh_15_u:035.006a: kaccit kuntī ca rājaṃs tvāṃ śuśrūṣur anahaṃkṛtā
GE07mbh_15_u:035.006c: yā parityajya rājyaṃ svaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
GE07mbh_15_u:035.008a: kaccin nandasi dṛṣṭvaitān kaccit te nirmalaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.009a: etad dhi tritayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhūteṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:035.009c: nirvairatā mahārāja satyam adroha eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:035.010c: svadate vanyam annaṃ vā munivāsāṃsi vā vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:035.011a: viditaṃ cāpi me rājan vidurasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.012a: māṇḍavyaśāpād dhi sa vai dharmo viduratāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.013a: bṛhaspatir vā deveṣu śukro vāpy asureṣu yaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.013c: na tathā buddhisaṃpanno yathā sa puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.015a: niyogād brahmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā svena balena ca
GE07mbh_15_u:035.016c: dhāraṇāc chreyaso dhyānād yaṃ dharmaṃ kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.017c: ahiṃsayā ca dānena tapasā ca sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.018d-0060_01: pratyakṣaṃ pūjito yena cittasthaś cinmayo hariḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.019a: yathā hy agnir yathā vāyur yathāpaḥ pṛthivī yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:035.019c: yathākāśaṃ tathā dharma iha cāmutra ca sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.020a: sarvagaś caiva kauravya sarvaṃ vyāpya carācaram
GE07mbh_15_u:035.021a: yo hi dharmaḥ sa viduro viduro yaḥ sa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.021c: sa eṣa rājan vaśyas te pāṇḍavaḥ preṣyavat sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.022a: praviṣṭaḥ sa svam ātmānaṃ bhrātā te buddhisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.023a: tvāṃ cāpi śreyasā yokṣye nacirād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:035.023c: saṃśayacchedanārthaṃ hi prāptaṃ māṃ viddhi putraka
GE07mbh_15_u:035.024a: na kṛtaṃ yat purā kaiś cit karma loke maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:035.025a: kim icchasi mahīpāla mattaḥ prāptum amānuṣam
GE07mbh_15_u:035.025c: draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭum atha śrotuṃ vada kartāsmi tat tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:036.003a: yat tad āścaryam iti vai kariṣyāmīty uvāca ha
GE07mbh_15_u:036.003c: vyāsaḥ paramatejasvī maharṣis tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_15_u:036.004a: vanavāse ca kauravyaḥ kiyantaṃ kālam acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.005a: kimāhārāś ca te tatra sasainyā nyavasan prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:036.005c: sāntaḥpurā mahātmāna iti tad brūhi me 'nagha vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_15_u:036.006-0061_03: prathame divase caiṣām āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:036.007a: māsam ekaṃ vijahrus te sasainyāntaḥpurā vane
GE07mbh_15_u:036.007c: atha tatrāgamad vyāso yathoktaṃ te mayānagha
GE07mbh_15_u:036.008a: tathā tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kathābhir nṛpasaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_15_u:036.009a: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva devalaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.009c: viśvāvasus tumburuś ca citrasenaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:036.010a: teṣām api yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.011a: niṣedus te tataḥ sarve pūjāṃ prāpya yudhiṣṭhirāt
GE07mbh_15_u:036.011c: āsaneṣv atha puṇyeṣu barhiṣkeṣu vareṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:036.012a: teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu sa tu rājā mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.013a: gāndhārī caiva kuntī ca draupadī sātvatī tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:036.014a: teṣāṃ tatra kathā divyā dharmiṣṭhāś cābhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:036.015a: tataḥ kathānte vyāsas taṃ prajñācakṣuṣam īśvaram
GE07mbh_15_u:036.015c: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ punar eva sa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.016a: viditaṃ mama rājendra yat te hṛdi vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.017a: gāndhāryāś caiva yad duḥkhaṃ hṛdi tiṣṭhati pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:036.017c: kuntyāś ca yan mahārāja draupadyāś ca hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.018a: yac ca dhārayate tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ putravināśajam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.018c: subhadrā kṛṣṇabhaginī tac cāpi viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_15_u:036.019a: śrutvā samāgamam imaṃ sarveṣāṃ vas tato nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:036.020a: ime ca devagandharvāḥ sarve caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.020c: paśyantu tapaso vīryam adya me cirasaṃbhṛtam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.021a: tad ucyatāṃ mahābāho kaṃ kāmaṃ pradiśāmi te
GE07mbh_15_u:036.021c: pravaṇo 'smi varaṃ dātuṃ paśya me tapaso balam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.023a: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_15_u:036.023c: yan me samāgamo 'dyeha bhavadbhiḥ saha sādhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.024a: adya cāpy avagacchāmi gatim iṣṭām ihātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.025a: darśanād eva bhavatāṃ pūto 'haṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.025c: vidyate na bhayaṃ cāpi paralokān mamānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.026a: kiṃ tu tasya sudurbuddher mandasyāpanayair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.026c: dūyate me mano nityaṃ smarataḥ putragṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.028c: āgamya mama putrārthe sarve mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:036.029a: ye te putrāṃś ca dārāś ca prāṇāṃś ca manasaḥ priyān
GE07mbh_15_u:036.029b-0063_01: bhogāṃś ca vividhāṃs tāta iṣṭāpūrtāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:036.030a: kā nu teṣāṃ gatir brahman mitrārthe ye hatā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_15_u:036.030c: tathaiva putrapautrāṇāṃ mama ye nihatā yudhi
GE07mbh_15_u:036.031c: bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ vṛddhaṃ droṇaṃ ca dvijasattamam
GE07mbh_15_u:036.032c: kṣayaṃ nītaṃ kulaṃ dīptaṃ pṛthivīrājyam icchatā
GE07mbh_15_u:036.033e: iti me cintayānasya pitaḥ śarma na vidyate
GE07mbh_15_u:037.001a: tac chrutvā vividhaṃ tasya rājarṣeḥ paridevitam
GE07mbh_15_u:037.002a: kuntyā drupadaputryāś ca subhadrāyās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:037.002c: tāsāṃ ca varanārīṇāṃ vadhūnāṃ kauravasya ha
GE07mbh_15_u:037.003d-0064_02: tac cāsya mānasaṃ jñātaṃ bhagavaṃs tapasā tvayā
GE07mbh_15_u:037.004c: asya rājño hatān putrāñ śocato na śamo vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:037.005c: na śete vasatīḥ sarvā dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāmune
GE07mbh_15_u:037.006a: lokān anyān samartho 'si sraṣṭuṃ sarvāṃs tapobalāt
GE07mbh_15_u:037.006c: kim u lokāntaragatān rājño darśayituṃ sutān
GE07mbh_15_u:037.007a: iyaṃ ca draupadī kṛṣṇā hatajñātisutā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:037.007c: śocaty atīva sādhvī te snuṣāṇāṃ dayitā snuṣā
GE07mbh_15_u:037.010a: yasyās tu śvaśuro dhīmān bāhlīkaḥ sa kurūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:037.010c: nihataḥ somadattaś ca pitrā saha mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_15_u:037.011c: putrasya te putraśataṃ nihataṃ yad raṇājire
GE07mbh_15_u:037.012c: punaḥ punar vardhayānaṃ śokaṃ rājño mamaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:037.013a: ye ca śūrā mahātmānaḥ śvaśurā me mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:037.013c: somadattaprabhṛtayaḥ kā nu teṣāṃ gatiḥ prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:037.014c: kuryāt kālam ahaṃ caiva kuntī ceyaṃ vadhūs tava
GE07mbh_15_u:037.017a: tām uvāca tato vyāso yat te kāryaṃ vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:037.017c: tad brūhi tvaṃ mahāprājñe yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_15_u:037.018a: tataḥ kuntī śvaśurayoḥ praṇamya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:038.001c: sa me devātidevas tvaṃ śṛṇu satyāṃ giraṃ mama
GE07mbh_15_u:038.002a: tapasvī kopano vipro durvāsā nāma me pituḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.002c: bhikṣām upāgato bhoktuṃ tam ahaṃ paryatoṣayam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.003a: śaucena tv āgasas tyāgaiḥ śuddhena manasā tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:038.003c: kopasthāneṣv api mahatsv akupyaṃ na kadā cana
GE07mbh_15_u:038.004a: sa me varam adāt prītaḥ kṛtam ity aham abruvam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.004b-0065_01: sa prīto varado me 'bhūt kṛtakṛtyo mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.004c: avaśyaṃ te grahītavyam iti māṃ so 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.004d-0066_01: tam ahaṃ bhayasaṃvignā yāce sānunayaṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.005a: tataḥ śāpabhayād vipram avocaṃ punar eva tam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.005c: evam astv iti ca prāha punar eva sa māṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.006a: dharmasya jananī bhadre bhavitrī tvaṃ varānane
GE07mbh_15_u:038.006c: vaśe sthāsyanti te devā yāṃs tvam āvāhayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:038.007c: na ca sarvāsv avasthāsu smṛtir me vipraṇaśyati
GE07mbh_15_u:038.008c: saṃsmṛtya tad ṛṣer vākyaṃ spṛhayantī divākaram
GE07mbh_15_u:038.009c: dvidhā kṛtvātmano dehaṃ bhūmau ca gagane 'pi ca
GE07mbh_15_u:038.009e: tatāpa lokān ekena dvitīyenāgamac ca mām
GE07mbh_15_u:038.010a: sa mām uvāca vepantīṃ varaṃ matto vṛṇīṣva ha
GE07mbh_15_u:038.010c: gamyatām iti taṃ cāhaṃ praṇamya śirasāvadam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.011a: sa mām uvāca tigmāṃśur vṛthāhvānaṃ na te kṣamam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.011c: dhakṣyāmi tvāṃ ca vipraṃ ca yena datto varas tava
GE07mbh_15_u:038.012a: tam ahaṃ rakṣatī vipraṃ śāpād anaparādhinam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.012c: putro me tvatsamo deva bhaved iti tato 'bruvam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.013a: tato māṃ tejasāviśya mohayitvā ca bhānumān
GE07mbh_15_u:038.013c: uvāca bhavitā putras tavety abhyagamad divam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.014c: gūḍhotpannaṃ sutaṃ bālaṃ jale karṇam avāsṛjam
GE07mbh_15_u:038.015a: nūnaṃ tasyaiva devasya prasādāt punar eva tu
GE07mbh_15_u:038.015c: kanyāham abhavaṃ vipra yathā prāha sa mām ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.016a: sa mayā mūḍhayā putro jñāyamāno 'py upekṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.016c: tan māṃ dahati viprarṣe yathā suviditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_15_u:038.017a: yadi pāpam apāpaṃ vā tad etad vivṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:038.017c: tan me bhayaṃ tvaṃ bhagavan vyapanetum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:038.018a: yac cāsya rājño viditaṃ hṛdisthaṃ bhavato 'nagha
GE07mbh_15_u:038.018c: taṃ cāyaṃ labhatāṃ kāmam adyaiva munisattama
GE07mbh_15_u:038.019a: ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vyāso vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.019c: sādhu sarvam idaṃ tathyam evam eva yathāttha mām
GE07mbh_15_u:038.019d-0067_01: sthityarthaṃ tena devena buddhis te parivartitā
GE07mbh_15_u:038.020a: aparādhaś ca te nāsti kanyābhāvaṃ gatā hy asi
GE07mbh_15_u:038.020c: devāś caiśvaryavanto vai śarīrāṇy āviśanti vai
GE07mbh_15_u:038.021a: santi devanikāyāś ca saṃkalpāj janayanti ye
GE07mbh_15_u:038.021c: vācā dṛṣṭyā tathā sparśāt saṃgharṣeṇeti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_15_u:038.022a: manuṣyadharmo daivena dharmeṇa na hi yujyate
GE07mbh_15_u:038.022c: iti kunti vyajānīhi vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:038.023a: sarvaṃ balavatāṃ pathyaṃ sarvaṃ balavatāṃ śuci
GE07mbh_15_u:038.023c: sarvaṃ balavatāṃ dharmaḥ sarvaṃ balavatāṃ svakam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.001a: bhadre drakṣyasi gāndhāri putrān bhrātṝn sakhīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.001c: vadhūś ca patibhiḥ sārdhaṃ niśi suptotthitā iva
GE07mbh_15_u:039.002a: karṇaṃ drakṣyati kuntī ca saubhadraṃ cāpi yādavī
GE07mbh_15_u:039.002c: draupadī pañca putrāṃś ca pitṝn bhrātṝṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:039.003c: yathāsmi codito rājñā bhavatyā pṛthayaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:039.004a: na te śocyā mahātmānaḥ sarva eva nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.004c: kṣatradharmaparāḥ santas tathā hi nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.006c: tathā puṇyajanāś caiva siddhā devarṣayo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_15_u:039.007a: devāś ca dānavāś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo 'malāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.007c: ta ete nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ kurukṣetre raṇājire
GE07mbh_15_u:039.008a: gandharvarājo yo dhīmān dhṛtarāṣṭra iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.008c: sa eva mānuṣe loke dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ patis tava
GE07mbh_15_u:039.010a: kaliṃ duryodhanaṃ viddhi śakuniṃ dvāparaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.011c: viddhi ca tvaṃ naram ṛṣim imaṃ pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.012a: dvidhā kṛtvātmano deham ādityaṃ tapatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.012c: lokāṃś ca tāpayānaṃ vai viddhi karṇaṃ ca śobhane
GE07mbh_15_u:039.012e: yaś ca vairārtham udbhūtaḥ saṃgharṣajananas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.012f-0068_01: taṃ karṇaṃ viddhi kalyāṇi bhāskaraṃ śubhadarśane
GE07mbh_15_u:039.013a: yaś ca pāṇḍavadāyādo hataḥ ṣaḍbhir mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.013c: sa soma iha saubhadro yogād evābhavad dvidhā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.014a: draupadyā saha saṃbhūtaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāvakāt
GE07mbh_15_u:039.014c: agner bhāgaṃ śubhaṃ viddhi rākṣasaṃ tu śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.015a: droṇaṃ bṛhaspater bhāgaṃ viddhi drauṇiṃ ca rudrajam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.015c: bhīṣmaṃ ca viddhi gāṅgeyaṃ vasuṃ mānuṣatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.016a: evam ete mahāprājñe devā mānuṣyam etya hi
GE07mbh_15_u:039.016c: tataḥ punar gatāḥ svargaṃ kṛte karmaṇi śobhane
GE07mbh_15_u:039.017a: yac ca vo hṛdi sarveṣāṃ duḥkham enac ciraṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_15_u:039.018a: sarve bhavanto gacchantu nadīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:039.018c: tatra drakṣyatha tān sarvān ye hatāsmin raṇājire
GE07mbh_15_u:039.019a: iti vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvo janas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.020a: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sāmātyaḥ prayayau saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.021a: tato gaṅgāṃ samāsādya krameṇa sa janārṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.022a: rājā ca pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham iṣṭe deśe sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.023a: jagāma tad ahaś cāpi teṣāṃ varṣaśataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:039.024a: atha puṇyaṃ girivaram astam abhyagamad raviḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:039.024c: tataḥ kṛtābhiṣekās te naiśaṃ karma samācaran
GE07mbh_15_u:040.001c: vyāsam abhyagaman sarve ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.002a: dhṛtarāṣṭras tu dharmātmā pāṇḍavaiḥ sahitas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:040.002c: śucir ekamanāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhis tair upāviśat
GE07mbh_15_u:040.003a: gāndhāryā saha nāryas tu sahitāḥ samupāviśan
GE07mbh_15_u:040.005a: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca ye yodhāḥ kauravāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.005d-0070_01: pratīkṣya tasthus te sarve teṣām āgamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:040.008c: draupadeyāś ca saubhadro rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.010c: bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo vṛṣasenaś ca sānujaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.011c: śikhaṇḍiputrāḥ sarve ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca sānujaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.012a: acalo vṛṣakaś caiva rākṣasaś cāpy alāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.012c: bāhlīkaḥ somadattaś ca cekitānaś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.013a: ete cānye ca bahavo bahutvād ye na kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.013c: sarve bhāsuradehās te samuttasthur jalāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.014a: yasya vīrasya yo veṣo yo dhvajo yac ca vāhanam
GE07mbh_15_u:040.014d-0071_01: yad varma yat praharaṇaṃ tena tena sa dṛśyate
GE07mbh_15_u:040.017a: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya ca tadā divyaṃ cakṣur narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:040.018c: dadarśa putrāṃs tān sarvān ye cānye 'pi raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:040.019a: tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca sumahad romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:040.020c: dadṛśe balam āyāntaṃ citraṃ paṭagataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:040.021a: dhṛtarāṣṭras tu tān sarvān paśyan divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_15_u:040.021c: mumude bharataśreṣṭha prasādāt tasya vai muneḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.003a: putraḥ pitrā ca mātrā ca bhāryā ca patinā saha
GE07mbh_15_u:041.003c: bhrātā bhrātrā sakhā caiva sakhyā rājan samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.004a: pāṇḍavās tu maheṣvāsaṃ karṇaṃ saubhadram eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:041.004d-0072_06: dharmarājaṃ samāśliṣya bhīmaṃ ca yamajāv api
GE07mbh_15_u:041.004d-0072_08: draupadīṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca saubhadro mahiṣīṃ svakām
GE07mbh_15_u:041.004d-0072_09: samāśvāsya sthito vīraḥ paśyan putraṃ parikṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:041.005a: tatas te prīyamāṇā vai karṇena saha pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.007a: evaṃ samāgatāḥ sarve gurubhir bāndhavais tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:041.007c: putraiś ca puruṣavyāghrāḥ kuravo 'nye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.008a: tāṃ rātrim ekāṃ kṛtsnāṃ te vihṛtya prītamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.009a: nātra śoko bhayaṃ trāso nāratir nāyaśo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010a: samāgatās tāḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiḥ patibhiḥ sutaiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010c: mudaṃ paramikāṃ prāpya nāryo duḥkham athātyajan
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010d-0074_01: devalokaṃ gatā ye ca ye ca brahmasado gatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010d-0074_02: ye cāpi vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ ye ca golokam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010d-0074_03: tathā vaivasvataṃ lokaṃ ye ca yakṣān upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010d-0074_04: rākṣasāṃś ca piśācāṃś ca kurūṃś cāpi tathottarān
GE07mbh_15_u:041.010d-0074_05: vicitrāś ca gati[tī]r anye ye prāptāḥ karmanirbharāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.011a: ekāṃ rātriṃ vihṛtyaivaṃ te vīrās tāś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.012a: tato visarjayām āsa lokāṃs tān munipuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.013c: sarathāḥ sadhvajāś caiva svāni sthānāni bhejire
GE07mbh_15_u:041.014a: devalokaṃ yayuḥ ke cit ke cid brahmasadas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:041.014c: ke cic ca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ ke cit kauberam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_15_u:041.015a: tathā vaivasvataṃ lokaṃ ke cic caivāpnuvan nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.015c: rākṣasānāṃ piśācānāṃ ke cic cāpy uttarān kurūn
GE07mbh_15_u:041.017e: tataḥ provāca tāḥ sarvāḥ kṣatriyā nihateśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.018a: yā yāḥ patikṛtāṃl lokān icchanti paramastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.019a: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā śraddadhānā varāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.019d-0077_01: uttarādyāḥ pradāyātha putrān svān anumānya ca
GE07mbh_15_u:041.020a: vimuktā mānuṣair dehais tatas tā bhartṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_15_u:041.020c: samājagmus tadā sādhvyaḥ sarvā eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_15_u:041.021a: evaṃ krameṇa sarvās tāḥ śīlavatyaḥ kulastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.021a-0078_02: tatas tāḥ kṣatriyā rājan yā yā vinihateśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.023c: sarvāḥ sarvaguṇair yuktāḥ svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ prapedire
GE07mbh_15_u:041.024a: yasya yasya ca yaḥ kāmas tasmin kāle 'bhavat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:041.024c: taṃ taṃ visṛṣṭavān vyāso varado dharmavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.025d-0079_02: babhūvuḥ pauravāḥ sarve tad dṛṣṭvāścaryam uttamam
GE07mbh_15_u:041.026a: priyaiḥ samāgamaṃ teṣāṃ ya imaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.026c: priyāṇi labhate nityam iha ca pretya caiva ha
GE07mbh_15_u:041.027c: ya imaṃ śrāvayed vidvān saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuyāt parām
GE07mbh_15_u:041.027d-0080_01: sa yaśaḥ prāpnuyāl loke paratra ca śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_15_u:041.028d-0082_01: punas te darśanaṃ prāptāḥ punaś ca parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:041.028d-0082_02: punaḥ punaḥ prayacchanti śṛṇvatām abhayaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:041.028e: śrutvā parva tv idaṃ nityam avāpsyanti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_15_u:042.001a: etac chrutvā nṛpo vidvān hṛṣṭo 'bhūj janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.002a: abravīc ca mudā yuktaḥ punarāgamanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:042.002c: kathaṃ nu tyaktadehānāṃ punas tad rūpadarśanam
GE07mbh_15_u:042.003a: ity uktaḥ sa dvijaśreṣṭho vyāsaśiṣyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_15_u:042.003c: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhas taṃ nṛpaṃ janamejayam
GE07mbh_15_u:042.005c: teṣāṃ ca nityasaṃvāso na vināśo viyujyatām
GE07mbh_15_u:042.006a: anāśāya kṛtaṃ karma tasya ceṣṭaḥ phalāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.007a: avināśī tathā nityaṃ kṣetrajña iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.008a: yāvan na kṣīyate karma tāvad asya svarūpatā
GE07mbh_15_u:042.009c: bhavanti te tathā nityāḥ pṛthagbhāvaṃ vijānatām
GE07mbh_15_u:042.010c: lokāntaragatā nityaṃ prāṇā nityā hi vājinaḥ
