GE07mbh_15_u:042.011a: ahaṃ hitaṃ vadāmy etat priyaṃ cet tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:042.011c: devayānā hi panthānaḥ śrutās te yajñasaṃstare
GE07mbh_15_u:042.012a: sukṛto yatra te yajñas tatra devā hitās tava
GE07mbh_15_u:042.012e: gatimantaś ca teneṣṭvā nānye nityā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_15_u:042.013a: nitye 'smin pañcake varge nitye cātmani yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.013e: viyoge śocate 'tyarthaṃ sa bāla iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.014a: viyoge doṣadarśī yaḥ saṃyogam iha varjayet
GE07mbh_15_u:042.014c: asaṅge saṃgamo nāsti duḥkhaṃ bhuvi viyogajam
GE07mbh_15_u:042.015c: aparajñaḥ parāṃ buddhiṃ spṛṣṭvā mohād vimucyate
GE07mbh_15_u:042.016c: nāhaṃ taṃ vedmi nāsau māṃ na ca me 'sti virāgatā
GE07mbh_15_u:042.017a: yena yena śarīreṇa karoty ayam anīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:042.017c: tena tena śarīreṇa tad avaśyam upāśnute
GE07mbh_15_u:043.001a: adṛṣṭvā tu nṛpaḥ putrān darśanaṃ pratilabdhavān
GE07mbh_15_u:043.002a: sa rājā rājadharmāṃś ca brahmopaniṣadaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:043.003a: viduraś ca mahāprājño yayau siddhiṃ tapobalāt
GE07mbh_15_u:043.004a: mamāpi varado vyāso darśayet pitaraṃ yadi
GE07mbh_15_u:043.004c: tad rūpaveṣavayasaṃ śraddadhyāṃ sarvam eva te
GE07mbh_15_u:043.005a: priyaṃ me syāt kṛtārthaś ca syām ahaṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.006a: ity uktavacane tasmin nṛpe vyāsaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_15_u:043.006c: prasādam akarod dhīmān ānayac ca parikṣitam
GE07mbh_15_u:043.008a: śamīkaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ putraṃ taṃ cāsya śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:043.008c: amātyā ye babhūvuś ca rājñas tāṃś ca dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_15_u:043.009c: pitaraṃ snāpayām āsa svayaṃ sasnau ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.010a: snātvā ca bharataśreṣṭhaḥ so ''stīkam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:043.011a: āstīka vividhāścaryo yajño 'yam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.011c: yad adyāyaṃ pitā prāpto mama śokapraṇāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.012a: ṛṣir dvaipāyano yatra purāṇas tapaso nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.012c: yajñe kurukulaśreṣṭha tasya lokāv ubhau jitau
GE07mbh_15_u:043.013c: sarpāś ca bhasmasān nītā gatāś ca padavīṃ pituḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.014a: kathaṃ cit takṣako muktaḥ satyatvāt tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_15_u:043.014c: ṛṣayaḥ pūjitāḥ sarve gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.016a: ye ca pakṣadharā dharme sadvṛttarucayaś ca ye
GE07mbh_15_u:043.016c: yān dṛṣṭvā hīyate pāpaṃ tebhyaḥ kāryā namaskriyāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.017a: etac chrutvā dvijaśreṣṭhāt sa rājā janamejayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_15_u:043.017b-0084_01: dṛṣṭvā ca pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ pūjayām āsa taṃ munim
GE07mbh_15_u:043.017b-0084_02: dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārāja prasādāt tasya vai muneḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.017c: pūjayām āsa tam ṛṣim anumānya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.017d-0085_01: parikṣid api tatraiva babhūva ca tirohitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:043.018a: papraccha tam ṛṣiṃ cāpi vaiśaṃpāyanam acyutam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.001a: dṛṣṭvā putrāṃs tathā pautrān sānubandhāñ janādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.001c: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kim akarod rājā caiva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.002a: tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ putrāṇāṃ darśanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.002c: vītaśokaḥ sa rājarṣiḥ punar āśramam āgamat
GE07mbh_15_u:044.003a: itaras tu janaḥ sarvas te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.007d-0087_01: yathāyaṃ vāsudevas tu dhṛtarāṣṭra balena vai
GE07mbh_15_u:044.007d-0087_02: jagatpati yathā dharmo loke tiṣṭhan kalāv api
GE07mbh_15_u:044.008a: mā sma śoke manaḥ kārṣīr diṣṭena vyathate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.009a: gatās te kṣatradharmeṇa śastrapūtāṃ gatiṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_15_u:044.010a: yudhiṣṭhiras tv ayaṃ dhīmān bhavantam anurudhyate
GE07mbh_15_u:044.011c: māsaḥ samadhiko hy eṣām atīto vasatāṃ vane
GE07mbh_15_u:044.012a: etad dhi nityaṃ yatnena padaṃ rakṣyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_15_u:044.012c: bahupratyarthikaṃ hy etad rājyaṃ nāma narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:044.014a: ajātaśatro bhadraṃ te śṛṇu me bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_15_u:044.015a: rame cāhaṃ tvayā putra pureva gajasāhvaye
GE07mbh_15_u:044.016a: prāptaṃ putraphalaṃ tvattaḥ prītir me vipulā tvayi
GE07mbh_15_u:044.016c: na me manyur mahābāho gamyatāṃ putra mā ciram
GE07mbh_15_u:044.017a: bhavantaṃ ceha saṃprekṣya tapo me parihīyate
GE07mbh_15_u:044.017c: tapoyuktaṃ śarīraṃ ca tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhāritaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.019c: vyāsasya tapaso vīryād bhavataś ca samāgamāt
GE07mbh_15_u:044.020a: prayojanaṃ ciraṃ vṛttaṃ jīvitasya ca me 'nagha
GE07mbh_15_u:044.020c: ugraṃ tapaḥ samāsthāsye tvam anujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:044.021a: tvayy adya piṇḍaḥ kīrtiś ca kulaṃ cedaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.021c: śvo vādya vā mahābāho gamyatāṃ putra mā ciram
GE07mbh_15_u:044.022c: saṃdeṣṭavyaṃ na paśyāmi kṛtam etāvatā vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:044.023a: ity uktavacanaṃ tāta nṛpo rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:044.023b-0088_01: tatkālayuktaṃ tathyaṃ ca buddhimān sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.023c: na mām arhasi dharmajña parityaktum anāgasam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.024a: kāmaṃ gacchantu me sarve bhrātaro 'nucarās tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:044.024c: bhavantam aham anviṣye mātarau ca yatavrate
GE07mbh_15_u:044.025a: tam uvācātha gāndhārī maivaṃ putra śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_15_u:044.025c: tvayy adhīnaṃ kurukulaṃ piṇḍaś ca śvaśurasya me
GE07mbh_15_u:044.026a: gamyatāṃ putra paryāptam etāvat pūjitā vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.026c: rājā yad āha tat kāryaṃ tvayā putra pitur vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.027a: ity uktaḥ sa tu gāndhāryā kuntīm idam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_15_u:044.028a: visarjayati māṃ rājā gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī kuntī uvāca
GE07mbh_15_u:044.028b-0089_01: śuśrūṣātikṛśā tvaṃ ca nātaḥ puṇyaṃ paraṃ mama
GE07mbh_15_u:044.028b-0089_02: na yuktaṃ tapaso vighnaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣākṛśā vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.028c: bhavatyāṃ baddhacittas tu kathaṃ yāsyāmi duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.029a: na cotsahe tapovighnaṃ kartuṃ te dharmacāriṇi
GE07mbh_15_u:044.029c: tapaso hi paraṃ nāsti tapasā vindate mahat
GE07mbh_15_u:044.030a: mamāpi na tathā rājñi rājye buddhir yathā purā
GE07mbh_15_u:044.030c: tapasy evānuraktaṃ me manaḥ sarvātmanā tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:044.031a: śūnyeyaṃ ca mahī sarvā na me prītikarī śubhe
GE07mbh_15_u:044.031c: bāndhavā naḥ parikṣīṇā balaṃ no na yathā purā
GE07mbh_15_u:044.032c: na teṣāṃ kulakartāraṃ kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_15_u:044.033a: sarve hi bhasmasān nītā droṇenaikena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_15_u:044.033c: avaśeṣās tu nihatā droṇaputreṇa vai niśi
GE07mbh_15_u:044.034a: cedayaś caiva matsyāś ca dṛṣṭapūrvās tathaiva naḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.034d-0090_01: sa vṛddhaṃ prīyate nityaṃ sa ca devaḥ parātmabhūḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.034e: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthātum icchāmi dharmārthaṃ nānyahetukam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.035a: śivena paśya naḥ sarvān durlabhaṃ darśanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_15_u:044.035c: bhaviṣyaty amba rājā hi tīvram ārapsyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.036a: etac chrutvā mahābāhuḥ sahadevo yudhāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.037c: pratiyātu bhavān kṣipraṃ tapas tapsyāmy ahaṃ vane
GE07mbh_15_u:044.039a: tam uvāca tataḥ kuntī pariṣvajya mahābhujam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.039c: gamyatāṃ putra maiva tvaṃ vocaḥ kuru vaco mama
GE07mbh_15_u:044.040a: āgamā vaḥ śivāḥ santu svasthā bhavata putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.040c: uparodho bhaved evam asmākaṃ tapasaḥ kṛte
GE07mbh_15_u:044.041c: tasmāt putraka gaccha tvaṃ śiṣṭam alpaṃ hi naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:044.042a: evaṃ saṃstambhitaṃ vākyaiḥ kuntyā bahuvidhair manaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.043a: te mātrā samanujñātā rājñā ca kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.045a: evam uktaḥ sa rājarṣir dharmarājñā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_15_u:044.046a: bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sāntvayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.046c: sa cāsya samyaṅ medhāvī pratyapadyata vīryavān
GE07mbh_15_u:044.047a: arjunaṃ ca samāśliṣya yamau ca puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_15_u:044.048c: jananyā samupāghrātāḥ pariṣvaktāś ca te nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.048e: cakruḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ sarve vatsā iva nivāraṇe
GE07mbh_15_u:044.049a: punaḥ punar nirīkṣantaḥ prajagmus te pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:044.050a: nyāyataḥ śvaśure vṛttiṃ prayujya prayayus tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:044.051a: tataḥ prajajñe ninadaḥ sūtānāṃ yujyatām iti
GE07mbh_15_u:044.051c: uṣṭrāṇāṃ krośatāṃ caiva hayānāṃ heṣatām api
GE07mbh_15_u:045.001b-0092_01: kadā cin nagare nāgasāhvaye ca yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_15_u:045.003c: kaccit te kuśalaṃ vipra śubhaṃ vā pratyupasthitam
GE07mbh_15_u:045.004a: ke deśāḥ paridṛṣṭās te kiṃ ca kāryaṃ karomi te
GE07mbh_15_u:045.004c: tad brūhi dvijamukhya tvam asmākaṃ ca priyo 'tithiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.005c: paridṛṣṭāni tīrthāni gaṅgā caiva mayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:045.006d-0095_01: vadanti pitaraṃ jyeṣṭham āsthitaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.006d-0095_02: taṃ draṣṭuṃ tatra gatvāham āgato nṛpasattamam
GE07mbh_15_u:045.007a: api dṛṣṭas tvayā tatra kuśalī sa kurūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.007c: gāndhārī ca pṛthā caiva sūtaputraś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.008a: kathaṃ ca vartate cādya pitā mama sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.008c: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan yadi dṛṣṭas tvayā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.009c: yathā śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ ca mayā tasmiṃs tapovane
GE07mbh_15_u:045.010c: kurukṣetrāt pitā tubhyaṃ gaṅgādvāraṃ yayau nṛpa
GE07mbh_15_u:045.011a: gāndhāryā sahito dhīmān vadhvā kuntyā samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.012a: ātasthe sa tapas tīvraṃ pitā tava tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.013a: vane sa munibhiḥ sarvaiḥ pūjyamāno mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.015a: agnīṃs tu yājakās tatra juhuvur vidhivat prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:045.015c: dṛśyato 'dṛśyataś caiva vane tasmin nṛpasya ha
GE07mbh_15_u:045.016c: te cāpi sahite devyau saṃjayaś ca tam anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.017a: saṃjayo nṛpater netā sameṣu viṣameṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:045.017c: gāndhāryās tu pṛthā rājaṃś cakṣur āsīd aninditā
GE07mbh_15_u:045.018a: tataḥ kadā cid gaṅgāyāḥ kacche sa nṛpasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.019a: atha vāyuḥ samudbhūto dāvāgnir abhavan mahān
GE07mbh_15_u:045.019c: dadāha tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ parigṛhya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.021a: samāviddhe vane tasmin prāpte vyasana uttame
GE07mbh_15_u:045.022a: tataḥ sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā vahnim āyāntam antikāt
GE07mbh_15_u:045.022c: idam āha tataḥ sūtaṃ saṃjayaṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_15_u:045.023a: gaccha saṃjaya yatrāgnir na tvāṃ dahati karhi cit
GE07mbh_15_u:045.023c: vayam atrāgninā yuktā gamiṣyāmaḥ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_15_u:045.024a: tam uvāca kilodvignaḥ saṃjayo vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.024c: rājan mṛtyur aniṣṭo 'yaṃ bhavitā te vṛthāgninā
GE07mbh_15_u:045.025c: yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:045.026a: ity uktaḥ saṃjayenedaṃ punar āha sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.026c: naiṣa mṛtyur aniṣṭo no niḥsṛtānāṃ gṛhāt svayam
GE07mbh_15_u:045.027a: jalam agnis tathā vāyur atha vāpi vikarśanam
GE07mbh_15_u:045.028a: ity uktvā saṃjayaṃ rājā samādhāya manas tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:045.028c: prāṅmukhaḥ saha gāndhāryā kuntyā copāviśat tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:045.029a: saṃjayas taṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā pradakṣiṇam athākarot
GE07mbh_15_u:045.029c: uvāca cainaṃ medhāvī yuṅkṣvātmānam iti prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:045.030a: ṛṣiputro manīṣī sa rājā cakre 'sya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.031a: gāndhārī ca mahābhāgā jananī ca pṛthā tava
GE07mbh_15_u:045.031c: dāvāgninā samāyukte sa ca rājā pitā tava
GE07mbh_15_u:045.032a: saṃjayas tu mahāmātras tasmād dāvād amucyata
GE07mbh_15_u:045.033a: sa tān āmantrya tejasvī nivedyaitac ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.034a: evaṃ sa nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kururājo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.034c: gāndhārī ca pṛthā caiva jananyau te narādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:045.035c: tayoś ca devyor ubhayor dṛṣṭāni bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:045.036c: śrutvā rājñas tathā niṣṭhāṃ na tv aśocan gatiṃ ca te
GE07mbh_15_u:045.037c: yathā ca nṛpatir dagdho devyau te ceti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_15_u:045.038a: na śocitavyaṃ rājendra svantaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.038c: prāptavān agnisaṃyogaṃ gāndhārī jananī ca te
GE07mbh_15_u:045.039a: etac chrutvā tu sarveṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_15_u:045.040c: paurāṇāṃ ca mahārāja śrutvā rājñas tadā gatim
GE07mbh_15_u:045.041a: aho dhig iti rājā tu vikruśya bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:045.041e: bhīmasenapurogāś ca bhrātaraḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_15_u:045.043a: taṃ ca vṛddhaṃ tathā dagdhaṃ hataputraṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_15_u:045.043c: anvaśocanta te sarve gāndhārīṃ ca tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_15_u:045.044a: tasminn uparate śabde muhūrtād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:046.001a: tathā mahātmanas tasya tapasy ugre ca vartataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:046.002a: durvijñeyā hi gatayaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ matā mama
GE07mbh_15_u:046.003c: nāgāyutabalo rājā sa dagdho hi davāgninā
GE07mbh_15_u:046.005c: dharaṇyāṃ sa nṛpaḥ śete pāpasya mama karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:046.006a: na tu śocāmi gāndhārīṃ hataputrāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_15_u:046.007a: pṛthām eva tu śocāmi yā putraiśvaryam ṛddhimat
GE07mbh_15_u:046.008a: dhig rājyam idam asmākaṃ dhig balaṃ dhik parākramam
GE07mbh_15_u:046.008c: kṣatradharmaṃ ca dhig yasmān mṛtā jīvāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:046.009c: yat samutsṛjya rājyaṃ sā vanavāsam arocayat
GE07mbh_15_u:046.010c: anāthavat kathaṃ dagdhā iti muhyāmi cintayan
GE07mbh_15_u:046.011c: upakāram ajānan sa kṛtaghna iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:046.012e: dhig agniṃ dhik ca pārthasya viśrutāṃ satyasaṃdhatām
GE07mbh_15_u:046.012f-0099_01: dahate mātaraṃ mahyaṃ yasya te gatir īdṛśī

GE07mbh_15_u:046.015c: vṛthāgninā samāyukto niṣṭhāṃ prāptaḥ pitā mama
GE07mbh_15_u:046.017b-0100_01: bhīma māṃ trāhi dāvāgner bhayād ity abhiyācatī

GE07mbh_15_u:046.020d-0101_01: anyonyaṃ vīkṣya vīkṣyaivaṃ smṛtvā mātur upaplavam
GE07mbh_15_u:047.001a: nāsau vṛthāgninā dagdho yathā tatra śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_15_u:047.001c: vaicitravīryo nṛpatis tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata

GE07mbh_15_u:047.004c: tena tad vanam ādīptam iti me tāpasābruvan

GE07mbh_15_u:047.012c: yuyutsum agrataḥ kṛtvā dadus toyaṃ mahātmane
